original: nahi svabhāvato 'samarthaṃ āropitasāmarthyaṃ vā dahati pacati veti,

tātparya vaśāt puruṣeṇa eva prathamam anvaya bodhāt

prakṛti pratyayābhyām anvaya bodhe janite pi vākya eka vākya tā vat kriyā kāraka padayoḥ ajanita anvaya bodha tvam ākāṅkṣā
navyāḥ tu pada viśeṣa janya padārtha upasthitiḥ ghaṭaḥ karmatvam ānayanam kṛtiḥ iti evambidha pada ajanya padārtha upasthitiḥ vā
āsattiḥ anvaya bodha aṅgam iti āsatti abhāvāt evambidha śabdāt na anvaya bodhaḥ tvayā api

nanu kā yogyatā
na tāvat sajātīye nvaya darśanam
yathā kathañcid sājātyasya a vyāvarttaka tvāt
padārtha tā avacchedakena sājātyasya ādi ajātaḥ payaḥ pibati iti adau abhāvāt vākya arthasya apūrva tvāt ca
nā api samabhivyāhṛta padārtha saṃsarga vyāpya dharmavat tvam
vākya arthasya anumeya tva āpatteḥ

original: na ca vastugatyā saṃsargavyāpyo yo dharmastadvastaṃ tacca na jñātumupayujyate iti nānumeyaḥ saṃsarga iti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca vastu gatyā saṃsarga vyāpyaḥ yaḥ dharmaḥ tat vastam tat ca na jñātum upayujyate iti na anumeyaḥ saṃsargaḥ iti vācyam
yogyatā bhramāt śābda bhrama anupapatteḥ

original: ata evānvayaniścayaviraha eva yogyatā svarūpasattī hetuḥ tatra taddharmābhāvaniścaye tatprakārakaśābdajñānānudayāt iti parāstam /
analyzed: atas eva anvaya niścaya virahe eva yogyatā svarūpa sattī hetuḥ tatra tad dharma abhāva niścaye tad prakāraka śābda jñāna anudayāt iti parāstam
nā api samabhivyāhṛta padārtha saṃsarga abhāva vyāpya dharma śrūnyatvam

original: prameyamabhidheyamityādau saṃsargābhāvasyāprasiddhyā tadanirūpaṇāt gehaniṣṭhaghaṭābhāve pramite ghaṭo 'stītivākyāttanniścaye 'pyanvayajñānānudayācca
analyzed: prameyam abhidheyam ityādau saṃsarga abhāvasya aprasiddhyā tad anirūpaṇāt geha niṣṭha ghaṭa abhāve pramite ghaṭaḥ sti iti vākyāt tad niścaye pi anvaya jñāna anudayāt ca
nā api bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvaḥ
anyat ca yat bādhakam tad abhāvasya ayogye sattvāt
nā api prakṛta saṃsarga bādhakasya abhāvaḥ
pratiyogi siddhi asiddhi vyāghātāt

original: na ca prakṛtasaṃsarge anyatra siddhasya bādhakapramāṇasyābhāvaḥ,
analyzed: na ca prakṛta saṃsarge anyatra siddhasya bādhaka pramāṇasya abhāvaḥ
prakṛta saṃsargasya prathama pratīteḥ ayogye pi tad sattvāt ca
bibl ind
tatra bādhakam api asti iti ced
tarhi prakṛta saṃsarga bādhakasya abhāvaḥ tat ca aprasiddham
atas eva tatra bādhakasya api anirūpaṇam
na api itara padārtha saṃsarga abhāva pramā viṣaya tva abhāvaḥ pada padārthe
kevala anvayini aprasiddheḥ

original: etena yatrāsambandhagrāhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ nāsti tadyogyamiti nirastam /
analyzed: etena yatra asambandha grāhakam pramāṇam na asti tad yogyam iti nirastam
nā api bodhanīya saṃsarga abhāva pramā virahaḥ
pratiyogi aprasiddheḥ

original: bodhanīyasaṃsargasya prāgapratīteḥ yogyatā ca na svarūpasatyupayujyate ityuktam,
analyzed: bodhanīya saṃsargasya prāk apratīteḥ yogyatā ca na svarūpa satī upayujyate iti uktam
ayogye tat sattvasya anirūpaṇāt ca

original: api ca svīyabādhakapramāvirahasyāyogye 'pi sattvāt bādhakapramāmātravirahasya yogye 'pi jñātumaśakyatvāt parapramāyā ayogyatvāt /
analyzed: api ca svīya bādhaka pramā virahasya ayogye pi sattvāt bādhaka pramā mātra virahasya yogye pi jñātum aśakya tvāt para pramāyāḥ ayogya tvāt
na ca sva rūpa san eva ayam hetuḥ
svīya bādhaka pramā viraha dāśāyām yogyatā bhrameṇa śābda bhrama anupapatteḥ
anvaya prayojaka rūpavat tvena bādhaka pramā mātra virahaḥ numeyaḥ iti ced na

original: sekānānvitatoye dravadravyatve satyapi bādhakasattvena vyabhicārāt upajīvyatvena tasyaiva yogyatātvāpatteśca /
analyzed: seka anānvita toye drava dravya tve sati api bādhaka sattvena vyabhicārāt upajīvya tvena tasya eva yogyatā tva āpatteḥ ca
na ca evam eva iti vācyam
ākāṅkṣā satti anvaya prayojaka rūpavat tve sati api anāpta vākye bādhaka pramāyām anvābodhāt
bādhaka pramā virahaḥ hetuḥ iti ced tarhi āvaśyaka tvāt sā eva yogyatā
bibl ind
ucyate bādhaka pramā virahaḥ yogyatā
sā ca itara padārtha saṃsarge para padārtha niṣṭha atyanta abhāva pratiyogi tva pramā viśeṣya tva abhāvaḥ

original: prameyaṃ vācyamityatra prameyaniṣṭhātyantābhāvapratiyogitvapramāviśeṣyatvaṃ gotve prasiddhaṃ vācyatvasaṃsarge tadabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: prameyam vācyam iti atra prameya niṣṭha atyanta abhāva pratiyogitva pramā viśeṣya tvam go tve prasiddham vācyatva saṃsarge tad abhāvaḥ
vastutas tu itara padārtha saṃsarge para padārtha niṣṭha atyanta abhāva pratiyog iti avacchedaka dharma śūnyatvam yogyatā lāghavāt śakya jñāna tvāt ca
bibl ind

original: na ca naraśiraḥśaucānumānabādhāt tadaśaucabodhakaśabdāt anvayābodha iti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca nara śiraḥ śauca anumāna bādhāt tad aśauca bodhaka śabdāt anvaya abodhaḥ iti vācyam
upajīvya jātīya tvena śabdasya balavat tvāt tena eva tad anumāna bādhāt

original: nanvākāṅkṣāsattimattvena śabdasya pramāṇatā na tu yogyatāpi tanniveśino bādhābhāvasya pramāmātrahetutvāditi cet / na /
analyzed: nanu ākāṅkṣā āsattimat tvena śabdasya pramāṇatā na tu yogyatā api tad niveśinaḥ bādhā bhāvasya pramā mātra hetu tvāt iti ced na
bādhe hi pramāṇa doṣaḥ vaśyam vaktavyaḥ

original: anyathā pramāṇaviṣaye bādhāsambhavāt yathānumāne bādhādupādhikalpanadvārā vyāptivighātaḥ,
analyzed: anyathā pramāṇa viṣaye bādhā sambhavāt yathā anumāne bādhāt upādhi kalpana dvārā vyāpti vighātaḥ
nirūpādhau bādhā anavakāśāt
sā iyam na svarūpa satoḥ prayojikā śābda bhāsa uccheda prasaṅgāt

original: tanniścayaśca na bhavatyupāyābhāvāt iti cet / na /

original: ayogyatājñānasya pratibandhakasya sarvatrābhāvāt kvacittanniścayo 'pi yogyatānupalabdhā yatheha ghaṭo nāstīti /
analyzed: ayogya tā jñānasya pratibandhakasya sarvatra abhāvāt yogyatā anupalabdhā yathā iha ghaṭaḥ na asti iti

āsatti vāda parvapakṣaḥ
āsattiḥ ca avyavadhānena anvaya pratiyogi upasthitiḥ
sā ca smṛtiḥ na anubhavaḥ
atha nānā viśeṣaṇaka karma karttṛ karaṇa adhikaraṇa kriyā ādi kramika pada jñāna janya kramika padārtha smṛtīnām

original: na yaugapadyaṃ sambhavati āśutaravināśināṃ kramikāṇāṃ malakānupapatteriti kathaṃ
analyzed: na yaugapadyam sambhavati āśutara vināśinām kramikāṇām malaka anupapatteḥ iti katham
tāvat padārtha anvaya bodhaḥ viśeṣaṇa jñāna sādhya tvāt viśiṣṭa jñānasya iti ced

original: śrautrapratyekapadānubhavajanyasaṃskāramelakādekadaiva tāvatpadasmṛtiḥ tata ekadaiva tāvatpadārthasmṛtau satyāṃ vākyārthānubhavaḥ /
analyzed: śrautra pratyeka pada anubhava janya saṃskāra melakāt ekadā eva tāvat pada smṛtiḥ tatas ekadā eva tāvat padārtha smṛtau satyām vākya artha anubhavaḥ
na ca anya viṣayaka saṃskāreṇa na anyatra smaraṇam iti vācyam
vakyārtha anupapattyā phala balena saṃskārāṇām paraspara sahakāreṇa tatra eka smaraṇa kalpanāt
pratyeka varṇa saṃskārāṇām iva ananyagatika tayā pada smaraṇe
atha yat yat ākāṅkṣitam yogyam sannidhānam prapadyate
tena tena anvitaḥ sva arthaḥ padaiḥ evā avagamyate

original: na caivamanvayāntarābhidhānaṃ na syāt viramya vyāpārābhāvāditi vācyam /

original: evamapi prathamamananvaye hetvanupanyāsāt uttarasya hīdaṃ sāmagrīvaikalyaṃ na pūrvasyeti cet,

original: sannidhirna padajanyaivānyavabodhahetuḥ dvāramityādau adhyāhṛtenāpi pidhānādinā anvayabodhadarśanāt /

api tu tad arthaḥ

original: svārthānvayaparatvācchabdānāṃ dvāramiti na pidhānānvayabodhakamiti tadanvayabodhārthamavaśyaṃ śabdakalpanamiti cet / na /
analyzed: svārtha anvaya para tvāt śabdānām dvāram iti na pidhāna anvaya bodhakam iti tad anvaya bodha artham avaśyam śabda kalpanam iti ced na

atha dvāra pada sahabhāva mātram pidhehi śabdasya kalpyate lāghavāt
na ca pidhāna abhidhāyaka aneka śabda upasthitau vinigamaka virahaḥ

ākāṅkṣā ādimat pratiyogi anvita svārtha paratvasya krṛpta tvāt lāghavena artha adhyāhārāt

original: na ca śrutapadāni labdhaprayojanānīti kathamapyadhyāhṛte teṣāṃ tātparyamiti vācyam /

original: kathaṃ tarhyedanaṃ pacatītyatra samabhivyāhṛtamātrānvayaḥ kalāyāderapi smṛtatvāt iti cet / na /

original: anyathā tavāpi daivavaśasmṛtakalāyapadopasthāpitenānvayabodhaḥ syāt ayaṃ devadatta odanamityādivākye kriyāpadādhyāhārabhāvena kartturanabhidhānāt  #

original: nanu dvāraṃ pidhehītyādau pidhānaśabdānubhave pidhānopasthāpakapadatvena janakatvamiti cet / na /

original: anvayapratiyogyupasthāpakapadatvena janakatvāt na tu tadupasthāpakayāvatatpadatvena gauravāt /

evam pidhāna anvaya bodhe pi
anyathā gauṇa lākṣaṇikayoḥ anvaya bodhaḥ na syāt tayoḥ an anubhāvaka tvāt iti
bibl ind
ucyate kriyā pada upasthāpitā kriyā

original: kārakapadopasthāpitañca kārakaṃ parasparamākāṅkṣati na tūpasthitimātraṃ anyathā dvāraṃ karmatā pidhehi,
analyzed: kāraka pada upasthāpitam ca kārakam parasparam ākāṅkṣati na tu upasthiti mātram anyathā dvāram karma tā pidhehi
dvāram pidhānam kṛtiḥ iti atra api kriyā karma adhyāhāre iva anvaya bodha prasaṅgaḥ
kriyāyāḥ karmaṇaḥ ca upasthiteḥ tulya tvāt
evam vidha pada upasthāpite parasparam ākāṅkṣā na asti iti ced
tarhi ākāṅkṣāyām pada viśeṣa upasthāpita tvam tantram na tu upasthiti mātram
artha viśeṣe sādhu tvāt na atra anvaya bodhaḥ iti ced na

original: pidhehīti padaṃ vinā dvāramityasyāpyasādhutvāt tadarthayoge sādhutvasya tulyatvāt sādhutvajñānasyānvayabodhe 'prayojakatvācca gauravādapabhraṃśādapyanvayabodhācca
analyzed: pidhehi iti padam vinā dvāram iti asya api asādhu tvāt tad artha yoge sādhu tvasya tulya tvāt sādhu tva jñānasya anvaya bodhe prayojaka tvāt ca gauravāt apabhraṃśāt api anvaya bodhāt ca
na ca atra a saṃsarga agrahaḥ
bādhaka abhāvāt

original: tasmāt kriyā padasya kārakapadena kārakapadasya kriyāpadena sahānvayabodhakatvaṃ na tvekaṃ vinā tṛtīyānupapattiḥ,
analyzed: tasmāt kriyā padasya kāraka padena kāraka padasya kriyā padena saha anvaya bodhaka tvam na tu ekam vinā tṛtīyā anupapattiḥ
nahi kriyā padārtha yoge dvitīyā
ghaṭaḥ ānayanam kṛtiḥ iti atra api dvitīya āpatteḥ

original: tathā ca puṣpebhya ityatra spṛhayatipadādhyāhāraṃ vinā caturthyanupapattiḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca puṣpebhyaḥ iti atra spṛhayati pada adhyāhāram vinā caturthī anupapattiḥ

original: yadi spṛhayati padārthayoge caturtho tadā puṣpamicchatītyatrāpi syāt spṛhayatīcchatipadayorekārthatvāt /
analyzed: yadi spṛhayati padārtha yoge tadā puṣpam icchati iti atra api syāt spṛhayati icchati padayoḥ ekārtha tvāt

original: atha sādhutvārtha dvāraṃ puṣpebhya ityatra pidhehi-spṛhayatipadādhyāhāro 'numanyate na tvanvayabodhārthaṃ tasyānvayapratiyogivijñānādevopapatteriti
analyzed: atha sādhu tva artha dvāram puṣpebhyaḥ iti atra pidhehi spṛhayati pada adhyāhāraḥ nu manyate na tu anvaya bodha artham tasya anvaya pratiyogi vijñānāt eva upapatteḥ iti
tarhi kriyā pada yogam vinā na kāraka vibhakiḥ

original: kārakapadayogaṃ vinā na tadanvayayogyaṃ kriyāpadamiti kevalakārakapade kriyāpadādhyāhāraḥ,
analyzed: kāraka pada yogam vinā na tad anvaya yogyam kriyā padam iti kevala kāraka pade kriyā pada adhyāhāraḥ
kevala kriyāyām ca kāraka pada adhyāhāraḥ sādhu tva artham āvaśyakaḥ iti tad janya upasthitiḥ anvaya bodha aupayikaḥ

original: tasmāt kriyā-kārakapadopasthāpitayoreva kriyā-kārakayoḥ parasparamanvaya iti śabdādhyāhāra eva /
analyzed: tasmāt kriyā kāraka pada upasthāpitayoḥ eva kriyā kārakayoḥ parasparam anvayaḥ iti śabda adhyāhāraḥ eva
kartṛ ākṣepe tu vakṣyāmaḥ
bibl ind
tātparya vādaḥ

original: tātparyadhīnaṃ śabdapramāṇyaṃ tatra tatparatvaṃ na tatsādhyakatvaṃ padārtha-tatsaṃsargayoḥ śabdāsādhyatvāt /
analyzed: tātparya dhīnam śabda pramāṇyam tatra tad paratvam na tad sādhyaka tvam padārtha tad saṃsargayoḥ śabda asādhya tvāt
atha tad gocara pravṛtti nivṛtti sādhyaka tvam tad paratvam

original: tacca bhāvyārthasya sākṣāt bhūtārthasya tu praśaṃsā-nindāvākyasya praśastaninditārthapratipādanadvārā lākṣaṇikasya lakṣaṇīyaviṣayapravṛtti-nivṛttijanakatvaṃ  #
analyzed: tat ca bhāvya arthasya sākṣāt bhūta arthasya tu praśaṃsā nindā vākyasya praśasta nindita artha pratipādana dvārā lākṣaṇikasya lakṣaṇīya viṣaya pravṛtti nivṛtti janaka tvam
tad paratvam iti ced na

original: tatparatve tajjñānaṃ janayitvā tatra pravarttakatvaṃ tatpravarttakatvañca tatparatvamiti parasparāśrayāt /
analyzed: tad para tve tad jñānam janayitvā tatra pravarttaka tvam tad pravarttaka tvam ca tad para tvam iti paraspara āśrayāt
lākṣaṇikasya ananubhāvaka tve pi lakṣaṇīya paratvāt kāvya ādeḥ svarūpa ākhyāna mātra paratvena api paryavasānāt ca

original: nanu tatbuddhijanakatvaṃ tatparatvaṃ praśaṃsā-nindāvākyamapi praśasta-ninditasvārthadhīhetutvena tatparameva,
analyzed: nanu tad buddhi janaka tvam tad paratvam praśaṃsā nindā vākyam api praśasta nindita sva artha dhī hetutvena tat param eva

original: tacca jñānaṃ praśaste sarvaḥ pravartate ninditāñca nivartate iti svaviṣaye pravṛttinivṛttau janayatīti tatparamucyata iti cet / na /
analyzed: tat ca jñānam praśaste sarvaḥ pravartate ninditān ca nivartate iti sva viṣaye pravṛtti nivṛttau janayati iti tatparam ucyate iti ced na
gauṇa lākṣaṇikayoḥ anubhāvaka tvāt tad buddhi janane tad para tvam iti anyonya āśrayāt ca
tad janana yogya tvam iti ced

original: tarhyekatroccāraṇe nānārthe nānārthaparatvaṃ lakṣaṇāyāñca mukhyārthaparatvaṃ syāt yogyatāyāḥ sattvāt /
analyzed: tarhi ekatra uccāraṇe nānā arthe nānā artha paratvam lakṣaṇāyām ca mukhya artha paratvam syāt yogyatāyāḥ sattvāt
nā api tad pratipādyaka tvam
tātparyam vinā na tathā iti anyonya āśrayāt
praśaṃsā nindā vākyasya pravṛtti ādi apratipādaka tvāt lākṣaṇikasya apratipādaka tvāt ca

original: atha gaṅgāpadaṃ svārthāvinābhāvi tīraṃ pratipādayattatparamiti cet / na /
analyzed: atha gaṅgā padam svārtha avinābhāvi tīram pratipādayat tat param iti ced na

original: mañcāḥ krośantītyatra tena vināpi puruṣe tātparyāt gaṅgādipadaṃ matsyādiparaṃ mukhye tīraparañca syāt avinābhāvasya tādavasthyāt /
analyzed: mañcāḥ krośanti iti atra tena vinā api puruṣe tātparyāt gaṅgā ādi padam matsya ādi param mukhye tīra parañca syāt avinābhāvasya tādavasthyāt
mukhye bādhake sati iti ced

original: tarhi mukhyārthaparataiva na syāt na syācca gaccha gacchasītyatra gamanābhāvaparatvaṃ /
analyzed: tarhi mukhya artha para tā eva na syāt na syāt ca gaccha gacchasi iti atra gamana abhāva para tvam
ucyate

na ca ekam ekena ekadā siddham amasiddham ca iti jñāyate

original: na ca svarūpagatatāsādhyatva-sādhanatvayorato na virodha iti vācyam /

original: yadi hi svarūpanibandhanaṃ tadubhayaṃ tadā tatsvarūpaṃ sadaiva siddhamasiddhañca syāt,

original: idānīṃ sādhyatvaṃ agre sādhanatvaṃ jñāyata iti cet, na,

original: na ca kṛtisādhyatvena pākāderiṣṭasādhatvāt sādhanatvamapi sādhyam /

original: ityuktaṃ tasmāt kṛta -kriyamāṇavilakṣaṇaṃ kṛtyanantarabhaviṣyattārūpaṃ kṛtisādhyatvaṃ cikīrṣāprayojakaṃ tādṛśañca sādhanatvavirodhyeva /

kiñca sādhana tvasya siddha mātra dharma tvāt sādhana tva jñānam icchā virodhi
na hi kaścid siddham icchati iti uktam
etena vṛṣṭi ādau iṣṭasādhanatā jñānam upāya icchā kāraṇatvena kḷptam iti nirastam
katham tarhi svatas sundare vṛṣṭi ādi vicchā

anye tu sukha duḥkha abhāva tad sādhana iṣṭi chā prayojakam anugatam uddeśya tvam puruṣa artha pada vedanīyam dharma antaram asti anugata kāryasya anugata kāraṇa niyamya tvāt

original: kṛtisādhyatvañca kṛtau satyāṃ agrimakṣaṇe svarūpaṃ na kṛtiṃ vinā,

original: nanu kṛtau naṣṭāyāṃ sannapi dharmī na kāryaḥ tathāca kathaṃ kārye 'pūrve kāmino 'nvayaḥkṣaṇikatvena kriyātulyatvāditi cet, na,

original: yadvṛttikāmyasādhanatvaṃ tatra kāryatā buddheḥ prayojakatvāt na tu kāryatāviśiṣṭasya kāmyasādhanateti vyāptiḥ /
analyzed: yad vṛtti kāmya sādhana tvam tatra kāryatā buddheḥ prayojaka tvāt na tu kāryatā viśiṣṭasya kāmya sādhana tā iti vyāptiḥ

original: nanu pākādau kṛtisādhyatājñānaṃ na pratyakṣeṇa kṛtyanantaraṃ pāke sati kṛtisādhyatājñānaṃ tasmin sati kṛtirityanyonyāśrayāt kṛtisādhyatotīrṇe  #
analyzed: nanu pāka ādau kṛti sādhya tā jñānam na pratyakṣeṇa kṛti anantaram pāke sati kṛti sādhya tā jñānam tasmin sati kṛtiḥ iti anyonya āśrayāt kṛti sādhya tā utīrṇe  /
cikīrṣā kṛtyoḥ asambhavāt ca iti ced na

original: pāko matkṛtisādhyaḥ matkṛtiṃ vinā asattve sati madiṣṭasādhanatvāt daivādyanadhīnatve
analyzed: pākaḥ mad kṛti sādhyaḥ mad kṛtim vinā asattve sati mad iṣṭa sādhana tvāt daiva ādi anadhīna tve

original: sati madiṣṭasādhanatvādvā madbhojanavadityanumānāt svakṛtisādhyatājñānaṃ yasya yadiṣṭasādhanaṃ
analyzed: sati mad iṣṭa sādhana tvāt vā mad bhojana vat iti anumānāt sva kṛti sādhya tā jñānam yasya yat iṣṭa sādhanam

original: yatkṛtiṃ vinā yadā na sambhavati tat tadā tatkatisādhyaṃ iti vyāpteḥ /

original: balavadaniṣṭānanubandhitvañca liṅgaviśeṣaṇaṃ tena na madhu-viṣasaṃmpṛktānnabhojane vyabhicāraḥ sāmānyatastasyāpi kṛtisādhyatotīrṇe na vyabhicāraḥ  #
analyzed: balavat aniṣṭa ananubandhi tvam ca liṅga viśeṣaṇam tena na madhu viṣa saṃmpṛkta anna bhojane vyabhicāraḥ sāmānyatas tasya api kṛti sādhya tā utīrṇe na vyabhicāraḥ
sāmānyatas tasya api kṛti sādhya tvāt
atīta tā daśāyām ca atīta odana icchā viraheṇa iṣṭasādhanatva abhāvāt

original: ata eva nidāghadūnadehovarṣati vāride toyadātoyalābhasambhāvanāyāṃ vā saro 'vagāhane
analyzed: atas eva nidāgha dūna dehaḥ varṣati vāride toyada atoya lābha sambhāvanāyām vā saraḥ vagāhane

original: na pravartate iṣṭasantāpaśāntisādhanatoyasambandhasya svakṛtiṃ vināpi siddhipratisandhānena

original: yadā ca matkṛtiṃ vinā na sambhavatīti pratisandhatte tadā pravartate /

original: yasya santāpaśāntimamātramiṣṭaṃ sa sato 'vagāhanasyeṣṭasādhanatvameva na pratisandhatte upasthitavṛṣṭito 'pi tatsambhavāditi kaścit,
analyzed: yasya santāpa śāntim amātram iṣṭam sa sataḥ vagāhanasya iṣṭa sādhana tvam eva na pratisandhatte upasthita vṛṣṭitaḥ pi tad sambhavāt iti kaścid

original: tanna toyasambandhatvena santāpaśāntisādhanatvaṃ tasya ca saro 'vagāhane 'pi sattvāt anyathā vṛṣṭirapi tatsādhanaṃ na syāt saro 'vagāhanādapi  #
analyzed: tat na toya sambandha tvena santāpa śānti sādhana tvam tasya ca saraḥ vagāhane sattvāt anyathā vṛṣṭiḥ api tad sādhanam na syāt saraḥ vagāhanāt api

original: kāryasādhanatvañca kṛtisādhyatve na liṅgaṃ pākādivadodanāderapi pravṛtteḥ pūrvaṃ kṛtisādhyatvajñāne hetvabhāvāt /

original: nanvevaṃ liṅgajñānameva pravartakaṃ astu prāthamikatvāt āvaśyakatvāñca /

analyzed: tarhi yādṛśam kṛti sādhya tvam cikīrṣāyām prakāraḥ tādṛśam jñāne na asti iti anya prakāraka jñānāt eva cikīrṣā syāt

original: yattu smṛtapāke kṛtisādhyatvāsaṃsargāgrahātpravṛttiḥ sa cāsaṃsargāgrahaḥ iṣṭasādhanatāgrahāditi /

original: tasmāt asiddhasya kvacit siddhe siddhe siddhasya ca kvacit /

original: kiñca tavāpīṣṭasādhanatājñānāt kathaṃ vṛṣṭyādāvicchā siddhatvasyecchāvirodhitvāt anāgatasya jñātumaśakyatvāt /
analyzed: kiñca tava api iṣṭa sādhanatā jñānāt katham vṛṣṭi ādau icchā siddhatvasya icchā virodhi tvāt anāgatasya jñātum aśakya tvāt

original: ata eva siddhāsiddhaviṣayatvanirāsena sukhādijñānāt phale 'pi neccheti na vṛṣṭyādāviṣṭasādhanatāpi /

na ca vṛṣṭi ādi sādhya iṣṭa jñānāt vṛṣṭi ādau icchā

original: atha sāmānyalakṣaṇapratyāsattyā vṛṣṭyāditvena sukhāditvena ca siddhāsiddhavṛṣṭyādi-tatphalaviṣayakaṃ jñānamutpannaṃ tena siddhaṃ virodhinaṃ  #
analyzed: atha sāmānya lakṣaṇa pratyāsattyā vṛṣṭi ādi tvena sukha ādi tvena ca siddha asiddha vṛṣṭi ādi tad phala viṣayakam jñānam utpannam tena siddham virodhinam

original: yadi ca sāmānyalakṣaṇā nāsti tadā yena rūpeṇeṣṭasādhanatvagrahaḥ tena rūpeṇa jñāte siddhe vecchotpadyate,
analyzed: yadi ca sāmānya lakṣaṇā na asti tadā yena rūpeṇa iṣṭasādhanatva grahaḥ tena rūpeṇa jñāte siddhe vā icchā utpadyate

original: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tādṛśajñānasya tādṛśecchājanakatvāvadhāraṇāt sukhecchāyāmapyekaṃ iti cet,
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekābhyām tādṛśa jñānasya tādṛśa icchā janaka tva avadhāraṇāt sukha icchāyām api ekam iti ced

original: tarhi mamāpi pākatvācchedena kṛtisādhyatājñānādanāgate cikīrṣā tacca jñānaṃ sakalapākaviṣayaṃ sannikṛṣṭapākaviṣayaṃ vetyanyadetat /
analyzed: tarhi mama api pāka tva ācchedena kṛti sādhya tā jñānāt anāgate cikīrṣā tat ca jñānam sakala pāka viṣayam sannikṛṣṭa pāka viṣayam vā iti anyat etat

original: bālasya vyāptyādyagraheṇādyā pravṛttirjīvanādṛṣṭodbodhitajanmāntarasaṃskārajanyāt stanapānaṃ kāryamiti smaraṇāt tavāpīṣṭasādhanatāsmaraṇāt  #

tatra pravṛttiḥ ananyagatika tvāt
na ca janmāntare pi paryanuyogaḥ
janma dhārāyāḥ anādi tvāt pratyakṣa anumāna mūlaka tvāt ca na andha paramparā

original: vastutastu śuṣkakaṇṭhatayā bālo duḥkhamanubhavan virodhitayā sukhaṃ smarati,
analyzed: vastutas tu śuṣka kaṇṭha tayā bālaḥ duḥkham anubhavan virodhi tayā sukham smarati
tatas sukha tva jñānāt sukha vṛtti kārya tvam sukha vṛtti tayā
antaraṅga tvāt na tu stana pānam iṣṭa sādhanam iti smaraṇam

original: sukhāvṛttitvena vahiraṅgatvāt sukhakāryatvañca stanapānamapi viṣayaḥ tena stanapāne kāryatvajñānādeva pravṛttiḥ,
analyzed: sukha āvṛtti tvena vahiraṅga tvāt sukha kārya tvañca stana pānam api viṣayaḥ tena stana pāne kārya tva jñānāt eva pravṛttiḥ

original: iṣṭasādhanatājñānasya tadānīṃ sāmāgṣabhāvāt evañcādyapravṛttau kāryatvajñānaṃ prayojakaṃ kḷptamityagre 'pi tadeva pravartakaṃ kḷptatvāt /
analyzed: iṣṭasādhanatā jñānasya tadānīm sāmāgṣa bhāvāt evañca ādya pravṛttau kārya tva jñānam prayojakam kḷptam iti agre tat eva pravartakam kḷpta tvāt

original: navīnāstu mamedaṃ kṛtisādhyamiti jñānaṃ na pravartakaṃ anāgataviṣaye pratyakṣānumānayorasambhavāt,
analyzed: navīnāḥ tu mama idam kṛti sādhyam iti jñānam na pravartakam anāgata viṣaye pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ asambhavāt

original: kintu yādṛśasya puruṣasya kṛtisādhyaṃ yaddṛṣṭaṃ tādṛśatvamātmanaḥ pratisandhāya tatra pravartate,
analyzed: kintu yādṛśasya puruṣasya kṛti sādhyam yat dṛṣṭam tādṛśa tvam ātmanaḥ pratisandhāya tatra pravartate

original: tathāhyodanakāmasya tatsādhanatājñānavataśca taṇḍulādyupakaraṇavataḥ pākaḥ kṛtisādhyaḥ ahamapi ca tādṛśa iti jñānāt pāke pravartate /
analyzed: tathā hi odana kāmasya tad sādhana tā jñānavataḥ ca taṇḍula ādi upakaraṇavataḥ pākaḥ kṛti sādhyaḥ aham api ca tādṛśaḥ iti jñānāt pāke pravartate
evam ca anya kṛta pāke kṛti sādhya tā jñānam ātmanaḥ pāke kṛti sādhya tva prayojaka viśeṣaṇavat tva jñānam ca prapartakam
anyatra api pravṛttiḥ evam evā iti anādi tā eva

original: ata eva sañcātabādhaścaityavandane viṣayabhakṣaṇe ca na pravartate iṣṭasādhanatā jñānavato hi tat kṛtisādhyaṃ /
analyzed: atas eva sañcāta bādhaḥ caitya vandane viṣaya bhakṣaṇe ca na pravartate iṣṭa sādhana tā jñānavataḥ hi tat kṛti sādhyam
na ca sañjāta bādhaḥ tatra iṣṭa sādhana tā jñānavān

original: evaṃ tṛptīcchāvato 'pi bhojanaṃ kṛtisādhyaṃ tṛptaśca na tṛptīcchāvattvamātmanyavetīti na bhojane pravartate /
analyzed: evam bhojanam kṛti sādhyam tṛptaḥ ca na tṛpti icchāvat tvam ātmani aveti iti na bhojane pravartate
ati navīnāḥ tu yādṛśasya ityādau avigīta tvam tad kṛtau viśeṣaṇam āhuḥ

original: sañjātabādhastu viṣabhakṣaṇaṃ caityavandanañca vigītakṛtitādhyatvenaiva jānātīti tatra na pravartate /
analyzed: sañjāta bādhaḥ tu viṣa bhakṣaṇam caitya vandanam ca vigīta kṛti tādhya tvena eva jānāti iti tatra na pravartate
pravṛtti viṣayaḥ ca sāmānyatas kāla asambhinnaḥ pāka ādiḥ jñāyate
pravṛtti mahimnā ca anāgata pāka siddhiḥ

original: cikīrṣā ca kālāsambhinnaviṣayā na tu bhāvinaṃ kṛtyā sādhayāmītyākāraiveti /
analyzed: cikīrṣā ca kāla asambhinna viṣayā na tu bhāvinam kṛtyā sādhayāmi iti ākārā eva iti
bibl ind
vidhi vāda siddhāntaḥ
atra ucyate
na tu sva viśeṣaṇavat tā pratisandhāna janya tvam gauravāt
na ca siddha asiddha avasthayoḥ sādhya tva sādhana tvayoḥ virodhaḥ
niḥ viśeṣitayoḥ tayoḥ avirodhāt
siddhaḥ sādhyaḥ siddhaḥ sādhanam ca iti unubhavāt

original: tadā sādhyatvaṃ hi tadā sādhanatvasya virodhi niyamatastenaiva tasya pratikṣepeṇa sahānavasthānaniyamāt,
analyzed: tadā sādhya tvam hi tadā sādhana tvasya virodhi niyamataḥ tena eva tasya pratikṣepeṇa saha anavasthāna niyamāt
na tu sādhana tvasya anyadā sādhana tvasya vā
tayoḥ a pratikṣepāt
anyadā sādhana tve pi sādhana tvam asti eva sāmānya abhāve viśeṣa abhāva prasaṅgāt

original: evantadā asiddhatvasya tadā siddhatvaṃ virodhi niyamatastasyaiva pratikṣepāt,
analyzed: evam tadā asiddha tvasya tadā siddha tvam virodhi niyamataḥ tasya eva pratikṣepāt
na tu siddha tva mātram
anyat api tatra siddha tva abhāva prasaṅgāt

original: nirviśeṣitayorvirodhe ca siddhatvayoścānyataradeva pākādau syānna tu samayabhede 'pyubhayam /
analyzed: niḥ viśeṣitayoḥ virodhe ca siddha tvayoḥ ca anyatarat eva pāka ādau syāt na tu samaya bhede pi ubhayam

original: na ca tadā kṛtisādhyatve sati tadeṣṭasādhanatvajñānaṃ pravartakaṃ,
analyzed: na ca tadā kṛti sādhya tve sati tadā iṣṭa sādhana tva jñānam pravartakam

original: ata eva vājapeyena yajetetyatra yāgasya karaṇāvasthāyāṃ siddhatvena na vājapeyasya sādhyatā ekadā tayorvirodhāditi karmanāmadheyatvaṃ,
analyzed: atas eva vājapeyena yajeta iti atra yāgasya karaṇa avasthāyām siddha tvena na vājapeyasya sādhya tā ekadā tayoḥ virodhāt iti karma nāmadheya tvam

original: na tu karaṇasya siddhatvena sādhyatvavirodhaḥ yogasvarūpe tayoḥ sattvāt /
analyzed: na tu karaṇasya siddha tvena sādhya tva virodhaḥ yoga svarūpe tayoḥ sattvāt

atha viruddhayoḥ avacchebhedama ādayaḥ ekatra pratītiḥ syāt
na ca kṛti sādhya tva iṣṭa sādhana tvayoḥ samaya bheda mādayā ekatra pratītiḥ asti
tathā liṅga abhāvāt iti ced na
sādhyatva sādhanatvayoḥ avirodhasya ukta tvāt

original: evaṃ siddhatvāsiddhatvayorbhāvābhāvarūpatve 'pi na virodhaḥ ekadharmigatvena mānasiddhatvāt /
analyzed: evam siddha tva asiddha tvayoḥ bhāva abhāva rūpa tve pi na virodhaḥ eka dharmi ga tvena māna siddha tvāt

original: tasmāt saṃyoga-tadabhāvayoriva yena prakāreṇa yayorvirodhaḥ tena tayorekadharmigatatvaṃ na pratīyate,
analyzed: tasmāt saṃyoga tad abhāvayoḥ iva yena prakāreṇa yayoḥ virodhaḥ tena tayoḥ eka dharmi gata tvam na pratīyate
na tu rūpa antareṇa api iti

original: api ca yadi sādhyatva-sādhanatvayorvirodhastadā tavāpīṣṭasādhanatvena kāryasādhanatvena
analyzed: api ca yadi sādhyatva sādhanatvayoḥ virodhaḥ tadā tava api iṣṭa sādhana tvena kārya sādhana tvena

original: vā kāryatvaṃ nānumīyate hetu-sādhyayorvirodhena sāmānādhikaraṇyābhāvena vyāptyasiddheḥ
analyzed: vā kārya tvam na anumīyate hetu sādhyayoḥ virodhena sāmānādhikaraṇya abhāvena vyāpti asiddheḥ
pakṣe sādhya sādhanayoḥ anyatara sattve bādhā sidhyoḥ anyatara prasaṅgāt ca

original: na ca vācyamidānīṃ matkṛtisādhyatvaṃ sādhyamagre madiṣṭasādhanatvaṃ hetuḥ daivādyanadhīnatve
analyzed: na ca vācyam idānīm mad kṛti sādhya tvam sādhyam agre mad iṣṭa sādhana tvam hetuḥ daiva ādi anadhīna tve

original: sati yadagre madiṣṭāsādhanaṃ tadidānīṃ matkṛtisādhyamiti vyāptiḥ tathāca samayabhedamādāya
analyzed: sati yat agre mad iṣṭa asādhanam tat idānīm mad kṛti sādhyam iti vyāptiḥ tathā ca samaya bhedam ādāya
sādhya tva sādhana tvayoḥ avagamaḥ iti
idānīm agrima padārthayoḥ nānātvāt anugata rūpa abhāvena vyāpteḥ agrahāt
pāka nyāyena anyatra api tad tad samaya antarbhāvena sādhya tva sādhana tvayoḥ apratītiḥ

original: pratītau vā mamāpīdānīṃ kṛtisādhyatve satyagre iṣṭasādhanamiti jñānaṃ pravartakamastu /
analyzed: pratītau vā mama api idānīm kṛti sādhya tve sati agre iṣṭa sādhanam iti jñānam pravartakam astu
na ca pāke sādhya iṣṭaka tvena kṛti sādhya tvam anumeyam
asiddha avasthāvataḥ hi pākāt iṣṭa anutpatteḥ pākasya siddha tvam avagamya tad sādhya tvam iṣṭasya avagantavyam asiddha tvam ca avagamya
kṛti sādhya tvam iti siddha tva asiddha tvayoḥ virodhaḥ durvāraḥ

original: api ca svaviśeṣaṇadhījanyakāryatājñānābhāvāt sukhe kathaṃ cikīrṣā,
analyzed: api ca sva viśeṣaṇa dhī janya kārya tā jñāna abhāvāt sukhe katham cikīrṣā
na hi kṛti sādhya tā jñāna mātrāt sā
sañjāta bādhasya viṣa bhakṣaṇa ādau cikīrṣā prasaṅgāt

original: athopāyacikīrṣāyāṃ tatkāraṇaṃ icchākaraṇasukhatvajñāne kṛtisādhyatvaṃ yadā viṣayastadā sukhe cikīrṣā no cedicchāmātramiti dvayameva cikīrṣāheturiti
analyzed: atha upāya cikīrṣāyām tad kāraṇam icchā karaṇa sukha tva jñāne kṛti sādhya tvam yadā viṣayaḥ tadā sukhe cikīrṣā no ced icchā mātram iti dvayam eva cikīrṣā hetuḥ iti

original: tarhīcchāhetujñāne yadā kṛtisādhyatvaṃ bhāsate tāda cikīrṣā no cedicchāmātramityeva sukha-tadupāyacikīrṣākāraṇamastu lāghavāt,
analyzed: tarhi icchā hetu jñāne yadā kṛti sādhya tvam bhāsate cikīrṣā no ced icchā mātram iti eva sukha tad upāya cikīrṣā kāraṇam astu lāghavāt
sukha tva jñāna vat iṣṭasādhanatā jñānasya api icchā kāraṇa tvāt

original: ata eva pāke iṣṭasādhanatājñāne kṛtisādhyatvaṃ viṣaya iti tatra cikīrṣā na tu vṛṣṭyādijñāne tadviṣayatvamitīcchāmātraṃ,
analyzed: atas eva pāke iṣṭa sādhanatā jñāne kṛti sādhya tvam viṣayaḥ iti tatra cikīrṣā na tu vṛṣṭi ādi jñāne tad viṣaya tvam iti icchā mātram
sukha cikīrṣāyām icchā kāraṇa jñāne kṛti sādhya tā viṣayake cikīrṣā janaka tva avadhāraṇāt
anyathā tatra cikīrṣā anutpatteḥ
vastutas tu upāya cikīrṣā iṣṭa sādhana tā jñāna sādhyā upāya icchā tvāt vṛṣṭi icchā vat
na ca bhoga cikīrṣā vat tena vinā api syāt iti aprayoñjaka tvam

original: upāyecchāyāstadanvaya-vyatirekānuvidhānāt vṛṣṭeśca svato 'sundaratvenecchānutpatteḥ anugatopāyecchāyāṃ anugatasya prayojakatve sambhavati bādhakaṃ  #
analyzed: upāya icchāyāḥ tad anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānāt vṛṣṭeḥ ca svatas sundara tvena icchā anutpatteḥ anugata upāya icchāyām anugatasya prayojaka tve sambhavati bādhakam
vinā tyāga ayogāt ca

original: na ca cikīrṣānyatve sati upāyecchātvaṃ icchātvaṃ vā /
analyzed: na ca cikīrṣā anya tve sati upāya icchā tvam icchā tvam vā
tad janya tve prayojakam
gauravāt sukha icchāyām tad abhāvāt ca
evam ca upāya cikīrṣāyām iṣṭasādhanatva jñāne dhruve atiprasaṅga vāraṇa artham kṛti sādhyatva nirvāha artham ca kṛti sādhya tvam api viṣayatayā avacchedakam astu
na tu tat vihāya tanmātram
kḷpta kāraṇam vinā kārya anupapatteḥ

original: ata eva stanapānapravṛttāvapyupāyecchākāraṇatvena gṛhītasyeṣṭasādhanatvajñānasyāpi kalpanaṃ dṛṣṭānurodhitvāt kalpanāyāḥ /
analyzed: atas eva stana pāna pravṛttau api upāya icchā kāraṇa tvena gṛhītasya iṣṭasādhanatva jñānasya api kalpanam dṛṣṭa anurodhi tvāt kalpanāyāḥ

original: nanu sādhanatvamicchāvirodhi tasya siddhadharmatvāt vṛṣṭyādau tatsādhyeṣṭajñānādiccheti cet na,
analyzed: nanu sādhana tvam icchā virodhi tasya siddha dharma tvāt vṛṣṭi ādau tad sādhya iṣṭa jñānāt icchā iti ced na
niḥ viśeṣitayoḥ siddha tva asiddha tvayoḥ avirodhena icchā sādhana tvayoḥ avirodhāt

original: tadāsiddhatvaṃ tadā siddhatvañca necchāsādhanatvayoḥ prayojakamiti tathā na jñāyata eva /

asiddha avasthāt vṛṣṭi ādeḥ iṣā iṣā anutpatteḥ tasya avaśyam siddhatvam avagantavyam icchā anurodhi tvāt ca asiddhatvam iti

original: vṛṣṭau satyāmiṣṭaṃ tayā vinā netyanvaya-vyatirekagrahasya vṛṣṭisiddhatvamādāya vṛṣṭinirūpiteṣṭasādhyakatvagrāhakatvāt /
analyzed: vṛṣṭau satyām iṣṭam tayā vinā na iti anvaya vyatireka grahasya vṛṣṭi siddha tvam ādāya vṛṣṭi nirūpita iṣṭa sādhyaka tva grāhaka tvāt

original: kiñca cikīrṣājanyakṛtisādhyaṃ maṇḍalīkaraṇamityarthapratipādakaṃ 'maṇḍalīṃ kuryāditi vākyaṃ pramāṇaṃ syātviṣayābādhāt /
analyzed: kiñca cikīrṣā janya kṛti sādhyam maṇḍalī karaṇam iti artha pratipādakam maṇḍalīm kuryāt iti vākyam pramāṇam syāt viṣaya ābādhāt

original: parasya hi kṛtisādhyatvaudanakāmanāvattveṣṭasādhanatājñānānāṃ jñānaṃ tathā ātmana odanakāmānāvattevaṣṭasādhanatājñānasya jñānaṃ na pravṛttikāraṇaṃ
analyzed: parasya hi kṛti sādhya tva odana kāmanāvat tva iṣṭa sādhana tā jñānānām jñānam tathā ātmanaḥ odana kāma anāvattā ivaṣṭa sādhana tā jñānasya jñānam na pravṛtti kāraṇam
kintu mad kṛti sādhya tve sati mad iṣṭa sādhana tā jñānam eva lāghavāt

original: yathā ca sādhyatva-sādhanatvayoravirodhaḥ anāgatasya pākādeḥ kṛtisādhyatvajñānañca
analyzed: yathā ca sādhyatva sādhana tvayoḥ avirodhaḥ anāgatasya pāka ādeḥ kṛti sādhya tva jñānam ca
tathā upapāditam eva kiñca para kṛti sādhya tvam a jñātvā api sva kṛti sādhya iṣṭasādhana tā jñānāt

original: svakalpitalipyādau yauvane kāmodrekāt sambhogādau pravṛtteśca tadeva pravartakam /
analyzed: sva kalpita lipi ādau yauvane kāma udrekāt sambhoga ādau pravṛtteḥ ca tat eva pravartakam

original: vastutastu siddhaviṣayakakṛtisādhyatājñānāt kathaṃ kṛtyā sādhayāmītīcchā siddhe icchāvirahāt asiddhasyājñānāt /
analyzed: vastutas tu siddha viṣayaka kṛti sādhya tā jñānāt katham kṛtyā sādhayāmi iti icchā siddhe icchā virahāt asiddhasya ajñānāt

original: atha siddhaviṣayādeva kṛtisādhyatājñānāt asiddhaviṣayā kṛtisādhyatvenecchā jñāyate
analyzed: atha siddha viṣayāt eva kṛti sādhya tā jñānāt asiddha viṣayā kṛti sādhya tvena icchā jñāyate
icchāyāḥ asiddha viṣaya tva svabhāva tvāt eka prakāraka tvena jñāna cikīrṣayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ
na tu eka viṣaya tve sati gauravāt

original: icchāyā anāgataviṣayatvāt tasya cājñānāt tathātvadarśanāt sukhādīcchāyāmapyevamiti cet, na,

tathā api kṛti sādhya tā jñāne iṣṭasādhanatvam eva vyāvartakam astu sva parakīya iṣṭasādhanatā jñāna phala kāmanā jñāna apekṣayā

original: laghutvāt iṣṭasādhanatājñānajñānasya phalakāmanājñānasya ca hetutve mānābhāvācca /
analyzed: laghu tvāt iṣṭasādhanatā jñāna jñānasya phala kāmanā jñānasya ca hetu tve māna abhāvāt ca

original: navyāstu svakṛtisādhyatājñānameva pravartakaṃ tena svakṛtyasādhye vṛṣṭyādau kārīryāñca kṛṣīvalasya na pravṛttiḥ /
analyzed: navyāḥ tu sva kṛti sādhya tā jñānam eva pravartakam tena sva kṛtya sādhye vṛṣṭi ādau kārīryām ca kṛṣīvalasya na pravṛttiḥ
na ca sañjāta bādhasya viṣa bhakṣaṇe pravṛtti prasaṅgaḥ
sva kṛti sādhya tā jñāna viṣaye iṣṭa tvasya svarūpa sataḥ pravṛttau sahakāri tvāt
na ca sañjāta bādhasya viṣa bhakṣaṇa ādau icchā asti

original: iṣṭasādhanatvenājñānāt atītabhojane 'pyata eva na pravartate tṛpteḥ siddhatayā icchāviraheṇa
analyzed: iṣṭa sādhana tvena ajñānāt atīta bhojane eva na pravartate tṛpteḥ siddha tayā icchā viraheṇa

original: bhojane tadupādhikeṣṭatvābhāvādatītatṛptāvicchā nāstīti tatsādhane 'pīṣṭatvābhāvādeva na pravṛttiḥ /

original: na caivaṃ pāke na pravarteta tasya svarasataiṣṭatvābhāvāditi vācyam /

original: hantaivaṃ prāthamikatvādiṣṭatvārthamavaśyāpekṣaṇīyatvācca kṛtisādhyatve satīṣṭasādhanatājñānameva cikīrṣākāraṇamastviti cet, na,
analyzed: hanta evam prāthamika tvāt iṣṭa tva artham avaśya apekṣaṇīya tvāt ca kṛti sādhya tve sati iṣṭa sādhana tā jñānam eva cikīrṣā kāraṇam astu iti ced na

original: iṣṭāsādhanatvābhāve 'pi bhoge cikīrṣāsattvāt tasyāṃ svakṛtisādhanatvābhāve 'pi bhoge
analyzed: iṣṭa asādhana tva abhāve pi bhoge cikīrṣā sattvāt tasyām svakṛti sādhana tva abhāve pi bhoge

original: cikīrṣāsattvāt tasyāṃ svakṛtisādhyatvajñāne satīṣṭatvameva kāraṇaṃ na tviṣṭasādhanatvaṃ vyabhicārāt /
analyzed: cikīrṣā sattvāt tasyām sva kṛti sādhya tva jñāne sati iṣṭa tvam eva kāraṇam na tu iṣṭa sādhana tvam vyabhicārāt

original: sukhe cikīrṣā bhavatyeva kṛtistu na bhavati kṛteḥ /

original: na ca kṛtisādhyatvaṃ yāge bodhayitvā kṛtisādhyayāgasya sādhya iṣṭa iti liṅgā bodhayituṃ
analyzed: na ca kṛti sādhya tvam yāge bodhayitvā kṛti sādhya yāgasya sādhyaḥ iṣṭaḥ iti liṅgāḥ bodhayitum
śakyam api eka svārtha anvayam apara padārthe bodhayitvā tad anvita apara svārtha anvaya bodhaka tvasya

original: pade 'vyuptatteḥ yajipade ca kṛtyā saha yāgānvayaṃ bodhayitvā tadanvitāparasvārthānvayabodhakatvasya
analyzed: pade yaji pade ca kṛtyā saha yāga anvayam bodhayitvā tad anvita apara svārtha anvaya bodhaka tvasya

original: pade 'vyutpatteḥ yajipade ca kṛtyā saha yāgānvayaṃ bodhayitvā paryavasite punaḥ svārthānvayabodhakatve āvṛttiprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: pade vyutpatteḥ yaji pade ca kṛtyā saha yāga anvayam bodhayitvā paryavasite punar svārtha anvaya bodhaka tve āvṛtti prasaṅgaḥ

original: atha sādhyamiṣṭaṃ yasyeti sādhyeṣṭakatvaṃ śakyaṃ tathāca bahuvrrīhyarthāpekṣayā iṣṭasya sādhanamiti padyarthasya laghutvāttadeva śakyam /
analyzed: atha sādhyam iṣṭam yasya iti sādhya iṣṭaka tvam śakyam tathā ca bahuvrrīhi artha apekṣayā iṣṭasya sādhanam iti padi arthasya laghu tvāt tat eva śakyam

original: kiñca tatsādhyatvaṃ na niyamatastaduttarasattvaṃ daṇḍasādhye ghaṭe vyabhicārāt nāpi
analyzed: kiñca tad sādhya tvam na niyamataḥ tad uttara sattvam daṇḍa sādhye ghaṭe vyabhicārāt nā api
tad avacchinna kṣaṇa uttara kṣaṇe eva sattvam evakāra vyavacchedya tad anuttara samayasya ākāśe
prasiddheḥ śabdasya
tad asādhya tva āpatteḥ

original: ata eva na tadabhāvavyāpakābhāvapratiyāgitvaṃ rūpe rasasādhyatvāpatteśca /
analyzed: atas eva na tad abhāva vyāpaka abhāva pratiyāgi tvam rūpe rasa sādhya tva āpatteḥ ca

original: nāpi tadavadhikottaratvavyāpyasamayasambandhaḥ uttaratvavyāpyatvaṃ hyuttaratvānadhikaraṇakālāvṛttitvaṃ taccākāśe 'prasiddhaṃ gurutarañca /
analyzed: na api tad avadhika uttaratva vyāpya samaya sambandhaḥ uttaratva vyāpya tvam hi uttaratva anadhikaraṇa kāla āvṛtti tvam tat ca ākāśe prasiddham gurutaram ca

original: tasmāt tatsādhanakatvameva tatsādhyatvaṃ evañca lāghavāt tatsādhanatvajñānameva pravartakaṃ na tu tatsādhanakatvajñānamiti /
analyzed: tasmāt tad sādhanaka tvam eva tad sādhya tvam evañca lāghavāt tad sādhana tva jñānam eva pravartakam na tu tad sādhanaka tva jñānam iti

original: syādetat iṣṭatvajñānasya pravartakatve tṛpto 'pi bhojane pravarteta manasā tṛpteriṣṭatvajñānāt /
analyzed: syāt etat iṣṭa tva jñānasya pravartaka tve bhojane pravarteta manasā tṛpteḥ iṣṭa tva jñānāt

original: atha svarūpasatyapi phalecchā kāraṇaṃ sā ca siddhatayā tṛptau nāstīti cet tarhi hantaivamāvaśyakatvāt phalecchaiva kāraṇaṃ na tu tajjñānaṃ
analyzed: atha svarūpa satī api phala icchā kāraṇam sā ca siddha tayā tṛptau nā asti iti ced tarhi hanta evam āvaśyaka tvāt phala icchā eva kāraṇam na tu tat jñānam

original: kiñca icchājñānasya kāraṇatve icchā kāraṇaṃ na syāt svajñānena tannāśāt icchā tajjñānadhārākalpane 'navasthānāt /
analyzed: kiñca icchā jñānasya kāraṇa tve icchā kāraṇam na syāt sva jñānena tad nāśāt icchā tad jñāna dhārā kalpane nava sthānāt

original: api cecchāviṣayaḥ sukhaṃ iti jñānaṃ na mānasaṃ sukhasyāsiddhatayā tadviśeṣyakasākṣātkārasya
analyzed: api ca icchā viṣayaḥ sukham iti jñānam na mānasam sukhasya asiddha tayā tad viśeṣyaka sākṣātkārasya

original: tatsannikarṣaṃ vinā abhāvāt odanādāvapīṣṭatvajñānaṃ na sambhavati manāsobahirasvātantrāt /
analyzed: tad sannikarṣam vinā abhāvāt odana ādau api iṣṭatva jñānam na sambhavati manāsaḥ bahis asvātantrāt

original: nāpi cakṣurādinā jñātaḥ kṛta itivat iṣṭatvajñānaṃ tatra viśeṣyasannikarṣāt /
analyzed: nā api cakṣuḥ ādinā jñātaḥ kṛtaḥ iti vat iṣṭa tva jñānam tatra viśeṣya sannikarṣāt

original: vastutastu iṣṭasya viśiṣya sukhatvādinā ajñāne yāga pākādāviṣṭasādhanatājñānepyapravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ iṣṭasyāpalpādhikabhāvena nānāprakāratvena  #
analyzed: vastutas tu iṣṭasya viśiṣya sukha tva ādinā ajñāne yāga pāka ādau iṣṭa sādhanatā jñāne ipi apravṛtti prasaṅgaḥ iṣṭasya apalpa adhika bhāvena nānā prakāra tvena
ca viśiṣya anadhyavasāyāt
na ca iṣṭa viṣayatā avacchedaka sukha tva ādeḥ upalakṣaṇam iṣṭatvam sukha duḥkha abhāva tad sādhaneṣu anugatasya upalakṣyasya abhāvena ananugamāt iti
ucyate
yatra icchā tad sādhanatā jñānam eva loka veda sādhāraṇam pravartakam teṣām sukha duḥkha abhāva tad sādhanatvena icchā viṣayāṇām

original: ananugatānāmapi vastusadicchāviṣayatvamevānugamakaṃ evaṃ yadā sukhādāvicchā bhavati
analyzed: ananugatānām api vastu sat icchā viṣaya tvam eva anugamakam evam yadā sukha ādau icchā bhavati

original: svakṛtisādhyatve sati sukhādisādhanamiti jñānaṃ tadā pākādau pravartate /
analyzed: sva kṛti sādhya tve sati sukha ādi sādhanam iti jñānam tadā pāka ādau pravartate

original: nanvevaṃ pravartakajñānaviṣasya nānātvena tacchaktasya vidhipratyayasya nānārthatvaprasaṅga
analyzed: nanu evam pravartaka jñāna viṣasya nānātvena tad śaktasya vidhi pratyayasya nānārtha tva prasaṅga

original: iti cet na sukhatvādinānanugataṃ iṣṭatvenānugataṃ phalaṃ prati sādhanatvasya yāgāderliṅgādinā
analyzed: iti ced na sukha tva ādinā ananugatam iṣṭa tvena anugatam phalam prati sādhana tvasya yāga ādeḥ liṅga ādinā

original: bodhanāt tathā ca phalānāmanugamārthaṃ phalecchā śakyā na tvicchā jñānakāraṇatvena /
analyzed: bodhanāt tathā ca phalānām anugama artham phala icchā śakyā na tu icchā jñāna kāraṇa tvena

original: athaivaṃ sukhādisādhanatvena jñānaṃ pravartakaṃ tanna śakyaṃ ananugamāt yacca śakyamiṣṭasādhanatvaṃ
analyzed: atha evam sukha ādi sādhanatvena jñānam pravartakam tat na śakyam ananugamāt yat ca śakyam iṣṭasādhanatvam

original: tajjñānaṃ na pravartakaṃ iti vidheḥ pravartakatā na syāt iti cet sākṣādevameva kintviṣṭasādhanaṃ
analyzed: tat jñānam na pravartakam iti vidheḥ pravartaka tā na syāt iti ced sākṣāt evam eva kintu iṣṭa sādhanam

original: yāgaiti liṅgā bodhite iṣṭākāṅkṣāyāṃ kāmyatvena śrutaḥ svarga eva iṣṭatvenāvagamyate
analyzed: yāgaḥ eti liṅgāḥ bodhite iṣṭa ākāṅkṣāyām kāmya tvena śrutaḥ svargaḥ eva iṣṭa tvena avagamyate

original: tadanantaraṃ svargakāmapadasamabhivyāhārāt svargasādhanaṃ yāga iti jñānaṃ pravartakamutpadyate /
analyzed: tad anantaram svarga kāma pada samabhivyāhārāt svarga sādhanam yāgaḥ iti jñānam pravartakam utpadyate
evam ca vidhi janya jñāna janyam jñānam pravartakam
bibl ind

original: yattu sarveṣāmeva vidherna sākṣāt pravartakaṃ vidhibodhakāt svakṛtisādhyatvāderanavagamāt
analyzed: yat tu sarveṣām eva vidheḥ na sākṣāt pravartakam vidhi bodhakāt sva kṛti sādhya tva ādeḥ anavagamāt
sva iṣṭa sādhana tvam ca aham iṣṭa sādhana yāgakaḥ svarga kāma tvāt darśa vākya avagata svarga kāma vat iti anantaram arthāt pratīyate tat na
yatra icchā tat sādhanam iti śābda jñānāt eva pravṛtti upapatteḥ tad pratītiḥ niṣphalā

original: anye tu sādhanatvamātraṃ vidhyarthaḥ svargādisādhanatālābhastu samabhivyāhārāt iṣṭasādhanatāpakṣe
analyzed: anye tu sādhanatva mātram vidhi arthaḥ svarga ādi sādhanatā lābhaḥ tu samabhivyāhārāt iṣṭa sādhanatā pakṣe

original: 'pi tasyopajīvyatvāt tathāhi yajetetyanena yāgaḥ kṛtisādhyaḥ sādhanañceti bodhite
analyzed: pi tasya upajīvya tvāt tathā hi yajeta iti anena yāgaḥ kṛti sādhyaḥ sādhanam ca iti bodhite

original: sādhanasya sādhyākāṅkṣāyāṃ kāmanāviṣayatvena śrutī'siddhaḥ svarga eva sādhanākāṅkṣo
analyzed: sādhanasya sādhya ākāṅkṣāyām kāmanā viṣaya tvena śrutī siddhaḥ svargaḥ eva sādhana ākāṅkṣaḥ
sādhya tvena avagamyate upasthita tvāt
na ca yāgasya sādhana ākāṅkṣā kṛti sādhya tvena eva upasthiteḥ

original: ata eva viśvajidādau svarga eva sādhyatvena kalpyata iti /
analyzed: atas eva viśvajit ādau svargaḥ eva sādhya tvena kalpyate iti

original: iṣṭasādhanatāvidhipakṣe 'pi ``tarati mṛtyuṃ tarati brahmahatyāṃ yo 'śvamedhena yajate'' ityādyarthavāde vidhikalpanamiti cet / na /
analyzed: iṣṭa sādhana tā vidhi pakṣe tarati mṛtyum tarati brahmahatyām śvamedhena yajate ityādi artha vāde vidhi kalpanam iti ced na

original: avinābhāvāt tathābhūtasādhanatvasya vidheyatvavyāptatvāt vyāpakānupalambhabādhodadvārāya vā prayojanābhāvānna tatkalpanaṃ tatretyapyāhuḥ /
analyzed: avinābhāvāt tathābhūta sādhanatvasya vidheya tva vyāpta tvāt vyāpaka anupalambha bādhaḥ da dvārāya vā prayojana abhāvāt na tad kalpanam tatra iti api āhuḥ

original: yattviṣṭasādhanatvābhidhāne karaṇe liṅgo 'nuśāsanāt darśa-paurṇamāsābhyāmityanabhihitādhikāravihitā tṛtīyā na syāditi /
analyzed: yat tu iṣṭa sādhana tva abhidhāne karaṇe liṅgaḥ nuśāsanāt darśa paurṇamāsābhyām iti anabhihita adhikāra vihitā tṛtīyā na syāt iti
tat na
upāya tā mātra abhidhāne pi tad viśeṣa karaṇa tva anabhidhānāt
vastutas tu abhihita anvaya labhyam yāga iṣṭa sādhanatvam iṣṭa sādhanatva mātrasya vidhi artha tvāt

original: navyāstu cikīrṣādvārā jñānasya kṛtau hetutā cikīrṣā ca kṛtāvicchā sanaḥ prakṛtyarthagocarecchāvācitvāt pipakṣādivat /
analyzed: navyāḥ tu cikīrṣā dvārā jñānasya kṛtau hetutā cikīrṣā ca kṛtau icchā sanaḥ prakṛti artha gocara icchā vāci tvāt pipakṣa ādi vat

original: na tu kṛtiviṣayapākādiviṣaye kṛtisādhyatvaprakārakecchābhidhāyakatvaṃ pākādeḥ prakṛtyanabhidheyatvāt /
analyzed: na tu kṛti viṣaya pāka ādi viṣaye kṛti sādhya tva prakāraka icchā abhidhāyakatvam pāka ādeḥ prakṛti anabhidheya tvāt

original: na hi kṛtivācakasya tadviṣayavācakatvaṃ karotītyukte tadviṣayasaṃśayāt /
analyzed: na hi kṛti vācakasya tad viṣaya vācaka tvam karoti iti ukte tad viṣaya saṃśayāt

original: evañca kṛtāviccheṣṭasādhanatājñānāt tatsādhyeṣṭajñānādvā vṛṣṭyādau tathā kalpanāt /
analyzed: evam ca kṛta aviccheṣṭa sādhana tā jñānāt tad sādhya iṣṭa jñānāt vā vṛṣṭi ādau tathā kalpanāt

original: yadā ca kṛtāvicchā tadā saiva cikīrṣā anyatrecchāmātraṃ na tu kṛtisādhyatājñānāt kṛtau kṛtisādhyatvābhāvāt /
analyzed: yadā ca kṛtau icchā tadā sā eva cikīrṣā anyatra icchā mātram na tu kṛti sādhya tā jñānāt kṛtau kṛti sādhya tva abhāvāt

original: atha pākaṃ kṛtyā sādhayāmītīcchānubhavasiddhā anubhavāpalāpe upekṣaṇīyatvāpatteḥ
analyzed: atha pākam kṛtyā sādhayāmi iti icchā anubhava siddhā anubhava apalāpe upekṣaṇīya tva āpatteḥ

original: sā ca kṛtisādhyatājñānāt sā ca cikīrṣāpadāpratipādyāpi kṛtihetuḥ samānaviṣayatvāt
analyzed: sā ca kṛti sādhya tā jñānāt sā ca cikīrṣā pada a pratipādyā api kṛti hetuḥ samāna viṣaya tvāt

original: na tu kṛtīcchā kṛtihetuḥ kṛtiviṣayāviṣayatvāditi cet asti tāvatpākakṛtāvicchā vṛṣṭīcchāvat
analyzed: na tu kṛti icchā kṛti hetuḥ kṛti viṣaya aviṣaya tvāt iti ced asti tāvat pāka kṛtā avicchā vṛṣṭi icchā vat

original: asti ca kṛtisādhyatvaprakārikecchā pāke tathāpi kṛtīcchaiva kṛtikāraṇaṃ lāghavāt
analyzed: asti ca kṛti sādhya tva prakārikā icchā pāke tathā api kṛti icchā eva kṛti kāraṇam lāghavāt
na tu kṛti sādhya tva prakārikā icchā gauravāt

original: dhātvarthānuparakte kṛtisvarūpe icchaiva nodetīti cet na /
analyzed: dhātvartha an uparakte kṛti svarūpe icchā eva nā udeti iti ced na
pāka ādi kṛti iṣṭa sādhana tā jñānāt pāka kṛtau icchā tatas kṛtiḥ iti abhyupagamāt

original: na cāvagati -pravṛttyoḥ samānaviṣayatvaṃ ubhayasiddhaṃ tasyaiva vicāryatvāt /
analyzed: na ca avagati pravṛttyoḥ samāna viṣaya tvam ubhaya siddham tasya eva vicārya tvāt

original: kathaṃ tarhi pākaṃ kṛtyā sādhayāmītīcchā yathā vahnisādhyatvena
analyzed: katham tarhi pākam kṛtyā sādhayāmi iti icchā yathā vahni sādhya tvena

original: iṣṭasādhanatāvagamāt vahninā pākaṃ sādhayāmītīcchā tathā kṛtisādhyatvena iṣṭasādhanatvāt
analyzed: iṣṭa sādhanatā avagamāt vahninā pākam sādhayāmi iti icchā tathā kṛti sādhya tvena iṣṭa sādhana tvāt

original: pākasya pākaṃ kṛtyā sādhayāmītīcchā anyathā tattadupāyasādhyatvena icchā pākādau
analyzed: pākasya pākam kṛtyā sādhayāmi iti icchā anyathā tad tad upāya sādhya tvena icchā pāka ādau
tad tad upāya sādhya tva prakāraka jñānāt syāt iti ananta kāraṇa kalpanā syāt
mama tu upāya icchāyām iṣṭa sādhana tā jñānam eva hetuḥ kriyā dvārā kṛteḥ iṣṭa sādhana tva jñāne

original: kriyāyā apīṣṭasādhanatvaṃ viṣayaiti kṛtīcchā bhavantī kriyāviṣayāpi bhavatīti jñānecchāprayatnānāṃ samānaviṣayatāpi /
analyzed: kriyāyāḥ api iṣṭa sādhana tvam viṣaya eti kṛtī icchā bhavantī kriyā viṣayā api bhavati iti jñāna icchā prayatnānām samāna viṣaya tā api

original: ata eva pākaṃ cikīrṣatīti cikīrṣāviṣayatayā pākaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: atas eva pākam cikīrṣati iti cikīrṣā viṣaya tayā pākaḥ pratīyate

original: yadvā icchāviṣayaviṣayatayā pākaḥ pratīyate ita tasya karmatā grāmaṃ jigamiṣati śatruṃ jighāṃsatītyatra grāmāderiva,
analyzed: yat vā icchā viṣaya viṣaya tayā pākaḥ pratīyate ita tasya karma tā grāmam jigamiṣati śatrum jighāṃsati iti atra grāma ādeḥ iva
na hi grāma ādau icchā siddha tvāt

original: ata eva bhoge sukhe ca cikīrṣā tadanukulakṛteriṣṭahetutvāt anyathā kṛtisādhyeṣṭasādhanatāpakṣe taccikīrṣāsāmagṣantaraṃ kalpyate /
analyzed: atas eva bhoge sukhe ca cikīrṣā tadanu kula kṛteḥ iṣṭa hetu tvāt anyathā kṛti sādhya iṣṭa sādhana tā pakṣe tad cikīrṣā sāmagṣa antaram kalpyate
evam ca sandhyā vandanam duḥkha sādhana a vandana abhāva rūpa tvena iṣṭam tad sādhanam kṛtiḥ iti

original: liṅgarthaḥ anyathā kṛtirna kṛtisādhyā sandhyāvandanañca neṣṭasādhanamiti kasya kṛtisādhyatve
analyzed: liṅga arthaḥ anyathā kṛtiḥ na kṛti sādhyā sandhyā vandanam ca na iṣṭa sādhanam iti kasya kṛti sādhya tve
sati iṣṭa sādhana tvam vidhi arthaḥ syāt
atas eva eka pratyaya abhidheya tva pratyāsatteḥ antaraṅga tayā vidhi pratyaya abhidheya iṣṭa sādhana tvasya

original: kṛtāvevānvayo na prakṛtyarthe tathaiva cikīrṣākāraṇajñānajanakatvāt prakṛtyarthasya
analyzed: kṛtau eva anvayaḥ na prakṛti arthe tathā eva cikīrṣā kāraṇa jñāna janaka tvāt prakṛti arthasya
ca kṛtau viṣaya tvena anvayaḥ iti
