viśiṣṭasya sandhyā kāla apagame n upagamāt

original: na ca sandhyākālīnākaraṇe viśeṣaṇaṃ kintu pratiyoṅgini karaṇe tathāca viśiṣṭābhāvaḥ sthira eveti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca sandhyā kālīna akaraṇe viśeṣaṇam kintu pratiyā uṅgini karaṇe tathāca viśiṣṭa abhāvaḥ sthiraḥ eva iti vācyam

original: sandhyāyā dvyakaraṇe 'nvayastasya padārthatvāt na tu karaṇe tasya padārthekadeśatvenāpradhānatvāt
analyzed: sandhyāyāḥ dvi akaraṇe nvayaḥ tasya padārtha tvāt na tu karaṇe tasya padārtha eka deśa tvena apradhāna tvāt

original: tathāpi dhvaṃsa eva vyāpāro 'stu tava sahabhāvānirūpakasyāpi kāraṇatvāt tasyānantatve
analyzed: tathā api dhvaṃsaḥ eva vyāpāraḥ stu tava sahabhāva anirūpakasya api kāraṇa tvāt tasya ananta tve
pi svabhāvāt sa avadhi phala janaka tvam

original: yatra yad dhvaṃsohetustatra tatprāgabhāvo 'pīti cet na duḥkhadhvaṃsajanyadadhni mithyādhīdhvaṃsasādhyamuktau ca vyabhicārāt
analyzed: yatra yat dhvaṃsaḥ hetuḥ tatra tad prāgabhāvaḥ api iti ced na duḥkha dhvaṃsa janya dadhni mithyā dhī dhvaṃsa sādhya muktau ca vyabhicārāt
pratibandhaka abhāva tvena hetu tve tathā bhāvāt ca

original: dhvaṃsenānupapattiḥ kathaṃ tenaiva samādhātavyeti cet na dhvaṃse sati tadvyāpāratvajñānaṃ vinānupapattestadvyāpāratvakalpanayā śānteriti /
analyzed: dhvaṃsena anupapattiḥ katham tena eva samādhātavyā iti ced na dhvaṃse sati tad vyāpāra tva jñānam vinā anupapatteḥ tad vyāpāra tva kalpanayā śānteḥ iti
mā evam
pratiyāgi dhvaṃsayoḥ ekatra ajanaka tvāt

original: na hi niyamato yaddhvaṃse sati yadabhavati tat tatra kāraṇam /
analyzed: na hi niyamataḥ yad dhvaṃse sati yat abhavati tat tatra kāraṇam
bibl ind

original: na ca saṃsargābhāvatvena hetutve tatheti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca saṃsarga abhāva tvena hetu tve tathā iti vācyam
vyabhicāra abhāvena tasya api prayojaka tvāt

original: atha śabdād yāgakāraṇatā vyāpāraṃ vinā tadanupapatteḥ tajjanyadhvaṃsasya kāraṇatvakalpanamityubhayamapi
analyzed: atha śabdāt yāga kāraṇatā vyāpāram vinā tad anupapatteḥ tad janya dhvaṃsasya kāraṇa tva kalpanam iti ubhayam api

original: janakaṃ anyatra tu mānābhāvānna tatheti cet na yāgadhvaṃsasya yāgajanyasvargaṃ prati
analyzed: janakam anyatra tu māna abhāvāt na tathā iti ced na yāga dhvaṃsasya yāga janya svargam prati
janaka tvasya pramāṇa antara virodhena arthāpattyā api akalpanāt

original: astu tarhi devatāprītireva vyāpāra iti cet yāgasya devatāprītihetutve mānābhāvāt gaṅgāsnānādau devatāprītihetutve mānābhāvāt gaṅgāsnānādau  #
analyzed: astu tarhi devatā prītiḥ eva vyāpāraḥ iti ced yāgasya devatā prīti hetu tve māna abhāvāt gaṅgā snāna ādau devatā prīti hetu tve māna abhāvāt gaṅgā snāna ādau
devatā viraheṇa tad asambhavāt

original: na ca tatrāpi tatprītiḥ tasya tatprītihetutve mānābhāvāt lāghavena kartu-bhoktṛgatavyāpārakalpanācca /
analyzed: na ca tatra api tad prītiḥ tasya tad prīti hetu tve māna abhāvāt lāghavena kartu bhoktṛ gata vyāpāra kalpanāt ca

original: nanu nāyaṃ niyamaḥ putrakṛtagayāśrāddhādinā pitari pitṛkṛtajāteṣṭyā putre cādṛṣṭotpatteḥ /
analyzed: nanu nā ayam niyamaḥ putra kṛta gayā śrāddha ādinā pitari pitṛ kṛta jāta iṣṭyā putre ca adṛṣṭa utpatteḥ

original: atha tatrāpi kartaryevādṛṣṭaṃ vihitakriyāyāḥ yāgasyeva kartṛgatādṛṣṭajanakatvāt /
analyzed: atha tatra api kartari eva adṛṣṭam vihita kriyāyāḥ yāgasya iva kartṛ gata adṛṣṭa janaka tvāt

original: na ca mukte putre tadadṛṣṭanāśāt pitari na svargaḥ syāditi vācyam /
analyzed: na ca mukte putre tad adṛṣṭa nāśāt pitari na svargaḥ syāt iti vācyam
adṛṣṭasya phala nāśya tayā pitari svarga abhāvena adṛṣṭa anāśāt sva vṛtti bhoga janaka adṛṣṭasya

original: muktivirodhitvāt na tu pitṛgatamadṛṣṭaṃ janyate mukte pitari doṣābhāvena yogināmiva
analyzed: mukti virodhi tvāt na tu pitṛ gatam adṛṣṭam janyate mukte pitari doṣa abhāvena yoginām iva

original: vihitakriyāyāḥ pitradṛṣṭājanakatvāt tathātve ca sāṅgamapi śrāddhādikaṃ niṣphalaṃ
analyzed: vihita kriyāyāḥ pitṛ adṛṣṭa ajanaka tvāt tathātve ca sa aṅgam api śrāddha ādikam niṣphalam

original: syāditi taddhidheraprāmāṇyāpattiḥ putragatādṛṣṭena ca mukte pitari sukhotpattau na
analyzed: syāt iti tad hi dheḥ aprāmāṇya āpattiḥ putra gata adṛṣṭena ca mukte pitari sukha utpattau na
virodhaḥ yoginām iva sukha utpattau doṣasya ahetu tvāt
bibl ind

original: atha pitṛsukhaṃ pitṛpuṇyajanyamiti pitari puṇyaṃ tena vinā tadasambhavāt na putre
analyzed: atha pitṛ sukham pitṛ puṇya janyam iti pitari puṇyam tena vinā tad asambhavāt na putre
tatra phala prasaṅgāt iti pitṛ svarga kāma anājanya kriyā pitṛ puṇya hetuḥ iti putra kriyā api

original: tajjaniketi cet evaṃ pitṛkriyāpi pitṛpuṇyajaniketi na tāṃ vinā pitari puṇyaṃ putrakriyā
analyzed: tad janikā iti ced evam pitṛ kriyā api pitṛ puṇya janikā iti na tām vinā pitari puṇyam putra kriyā

original: ca putrapuṇyajaniketi putre puṇyaṃ pitṛsvargakāmanājanyapuṇyatvena pitṛsvargaheturastu
analyzed: ca putra puṇya janikā iti putre puṇyam pitṛ svarga kāmanā janya puṇya tvena pitṛ svarga hetuḥ astu

original: tatpuṇyaṃ pitṛvṛtti tatsukhahetupuṇyatvāt na putravṛtti tatsukhahetupuṇyatvāditi
analyzed: tat puṇyam pitṛ vṛtti tad sukha hetu puṇya tvāt na putra vṛtti tad sukha hetu puṇya tvāt iti

original: cet na tatpuṇyaṃ na pitṛvṛtti tatkṛtyajanyapuṇyatvāt putravṛtti vā tatkṛtapuṇyatvāt
analyzed: ced na tat puṇyam na pitṛ vṛtti tad kṛtya janya puṇya tvāt putra vṛtti vā tad kṛta puṇya tvāt

original: tasmāt pitṛsvargakāmanājanyapuṇyatvena pitṛsvargahetuteti putra eva tatpuṇyamiti /
analyzed: tasmāt pitṛ svarga kāmanā janya puṇya tvena pitṛ svarga hetu tā iti putraḥ eva tat puṇyam iti
mā evam

original: svargopapādakaṃ hyapūrvaṃ svargāśraye kalpyate prathamopasthitatvāt lāghavāt kalpanāyāḥ sākṣādupapādakaviṣayatvācca /
analyzed: svarga upapādakam hi apūrvam svarga āśraye kalpyate prathama upasthita tvāt lāghavāt kalpanāyāḥ sākṣāt upapādaka viṣaya tvāt ca

original: na ca svargahetukāmanāśraye svargakāmanājanyakriyākartari vā vilambopasthitikatvāt gauravāt paramparayā svargopapādakatvācca /
analyzed: na ca svarga hetu kāmanā āśraye svarga kāmanā janya kriyā kartari vā vilamba upasthitika tvāt gauravāt paramparayā svarga upapādaka tvāt ca

original: yadi ca putrakṛtapuṇyena muktasya pituḥ śarīrādyutpattiḥ sukhañca syāt tadā sākṣividhayā
analyzed: yadi ca putra kṛta puṇyena muktasya pituḥ śarīra ādi utpattiḥ sukham ca syāt tadā sākṣi vidhayā

original: asatyābhidhānādiputrakriyājanyapāpena ``sa viṣṭhāyāṃ kṛmirbhūtvā pitṛbhiḥ saha pacyate''
analyzed: asatya abhidhāna ādi putra kriyā janya pāpena sa viṣṭhāyām kṛmiḥ bhūtvā pitṛbhiḥ saha pacyate
ityādi bodhita naraka bhāgi tā api muktasya pituḥ syāt

original: tathā ca putrakṛtatatathāvidhaśaṅkayā na kaścinmokṣārthaṃ brahmacaryādiduḥkhenātmānamavasādayet
analyzed: tathā ca putra kṛta ta tathāvidha śaṅkayā na kaścid mokṣa artham brahmacarya ādi duḥkhena ātmānam avasādayet

original: ``duḥkhenātyantaṃ vimuktaścarati na sa punarāvartate'' iti śrutivirodhaśca tathāca
analyzed: duḥkhena atyantam vimuktaḥ carati na sa punar āvartate iti śruti virodhaḥ ca tathā ca

original: muktasya sukha-duḥkhe śarīrañca bhavatītpadarśanaṃ mukte pitari śrāddhādinā doṣābhāvādeva nādṛṣṭamutpadyate /
analyzed: muktasya sukha duḥkhe śarīram ca bhavati iti adarśanam mukte pitari śrāddha ādinā doṣa abhāvāt eva na adṛṣṭam utpadyate
bibl ind

original: na caivaṃ sāṅgaśrāddhasyāpi niṣphalatvaṃ adṛṣṭotpattau svarūpasatodoṣasyāṅgasya vaiguṇyāt
analyzed: na ca evam sa aṅga śrāddhasya api niṣphala tvam adṛṣṭa utpattau svarūpa sataḥ doṣasya aṅgasya vaiguṇyāt

original: yathā vighnahetuduritaśūnyena kṛtaṃ maṅgalaṃ na pāpadhvaṃsaṃ janayati svarūpasataḥ
analyzed: yathā vighna hetu durita śūnyena kṛtam maṅgalam na pāpa dhvaṃsam janayati sva rūpa sataḥ
pāpasya aṅgasya abhāvāt evam ca yāgasya api vyadhikaraṇaḥ vyāpāraḥ bhaviṣyati iti
ucyate

original: vihitakriyāyā kartṛgatavyāpāradvārā kālāntarabhāviphalaṃ janyata ityutsargaḥ sa ca
analyzed: vihita kriyāyā kartṛ gata vyāpāra dvārā kāla antara bhāvi phalam janyate iti utsargaḥ sa ca

original: balavatā bādhakenāpodyate prakṛte ca bādhakaṃ nāsti yathā śāstradeśitaṃ phalamanuṣṭhātarītyutsvargaḥ
analyzed: balavatā bādhakena apodyate prakṛte ca bādhakam na asti yathā śāstra deśitam phalam anuṣṭhātari iti utsvargaḥ

original: sa ca balavatā bādhakenāpodyate prakṛte ca bādhakaṃ nāsti yathā śāstradeśitaṃ phalamanuṣṭhātarīyatyutsvargaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca balavatā bādhakena apodyate prakṛte ca bādhakam na asti yathā śāstra deśitam phalam anuṣṭhātar īyati utsvargaḥ

original: putrakṛtagayāśrāddhāsya pitṛsvargaṃ prati pitṛkṛtajāteṣṭeḥ putrapūtatvādikaṃ prati hetutvasya śāstreṇa bodhanāt /
nanvayaṃ niyama eva pitṛyajña-jāteṣṭyādau paramparāsambandhena kartṛgatameva phalam /
analyzed: nanu ayam niyamaḥ eva pitṛ yajña jāta iṣṭi ādau paramparā sambandhena kartṛ gatam eva phalam

original: na hi yasya kasyāpi pitari putre vā phalaṃ kintu svapitṛ-putrayostathāca svapitṛgatatvaṃ
analyzed: na hi yasya kasya api pitari putre vā phalam kintu sva pitṛ putrayoḥ tathā ca sva pitṛ gata tvam

original: svargabhāgipitṛkatvaṃ vā paramparāsambandhaḥ phalena putrasya evaṃ pūtaputrakatvādikamapi pitṛgatameva /
analyzed: svarga bhāgi pitṛka tvam vā paramparā sambandhaḥ phalena putrasya evam pūta putraka tva ādikam api pitṛ gatam eva

original: na ca palasya kartṛgatvaṃ sākṣāt sambandhenaiveti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca palasya kartṛ ga tvam sākṣāt sambandhena evā iti vācyam
grāma paśu putra hiraṇya ādīnām paramparayā kartṛ ga tvam iti vyabhicārāt
na hi grāma ādayaḥ sākṣāt kartṛ sambaddhāḥ

original: evaṃ phalasya sākṣāt kartṛgāmitvabodhane śāstrasyotsargo na tu phalasya kartṛgāmitābodhane /
analyzed: evam phalasya sākṣāt kartṛ gāmi tva bodhane śāstrasya utsargaḥ na tu phalasya kartṛ gāmi tā bodhane

original: yattu svargabhāgipitṛkatvaṃ na phalaṃ tatkāmanāyā adhikāriviśeṣaṇatvābhāvāt pitṛgatasvargakāma ityādiśruteḥ /
analyzed: yat tu svarga bhāgi pitṛkatvam na phalam tad kāmanāyāḥ adhikāri viśeṣaṇa tva abhāvāt pitṛ gata svarga kāmaḥ ityādi śruteḥ

original: svataśca tathā kāmanayā pravṛttau śrutakāmanāviraheṇa prayoge 'ṅgavaiguṇyāt phalābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: svatas ca tathā kāmanayā pravṛttau śruta kāmanā viraheṇa prayoge ṅga vaiguṇyāt phala abhāva prasaṅgaḥ
bibl ind

original: kiñca svargabhāgipitṛkatvaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ tatra viśeṣyaṃ tatpitṛkatvaṃ na kāmyaṃ na vā phalaṃ siddhatvātadasādhyatvācca kintu viśeṣaṇaṃ pitṛgatasvarga  #
analyzed: kiñca svarga bhāgi pitṛka tvam viśiṣṭam tatra viśeṣyam tad pitṛka tvam na kāmyam na vā phalam siddha tvāt tad asādhya tvāt ca kintu viśeṣaṇam pitṛ gata svarga
iti saḥ eva phalam iti
tat na

original: na hi svargabhāgipitṛkatvaṃ phalaṃ api tu svargeṇa samaṃ putrasya paramparāsambandharūpaṃ taduktamiti /
analyzed: na hi svarga bhāgi pitṛka tvam phalam api tu svargeṇa samam putrasya paramparā sambandha rūpam tat uktam iti

original: ucyate yadi paramparāsambandhena putragatatvaṃ pitṛsvargasya tadā saṃyuktasamavāyādinā putretarasyāpi phalaṃ syāt /
analyzed: ucyate yadi paramparā sambandhena putra gata tvam pitṛ svargasya tadā saṃyukta samavāya ādinā putra itarasya api phalam syāt

original: sa sambandho na śāstreṇa bodhita iti cet tarhi svargabhāgipitṛkatvamapi na tathā
analyzed: sa sambandhaḥ na śāstreṇa bodhitaḥ iti ced tarhi svarga bhāgi pitṛka tvam api na tathā

original: śāstreṇabādhitatvāt grāma-paśu-hiraṇyādīnāñca siddhatvena na kāmyatvaṃ kintu tadviṣayakaṃ
analyzed: śāstreṇa bādhita tvāt grāma paśu hiraṇya ādīnām ca siddha tvena na kāmya tvam kintu tad viṣayakam

original: svatvaṃ kāmyaṃ phalamapi tadeva tacca sākṣādeva kartṛgatamiti kartṛgatatvena phalakāmanā
analyzed: sva tvam kāmyam phalam api tat eva tat ca sākṣāt eva kartṛ gatam iti kartṛ gata tvena phala kāmanā
tad gatam eva śāstra deśitam phalam

original: ata eva kāmanāviṣayaḥ stagata eva svargaḥ phalaṃ yāgādeḥ svarga-pūtatvādeśca pitṛ-putragatatvena kāmyatvamiti śrāddha-jāteṣṭyādeḥ pitṛ-putragatameva  #
analyzed: atas eva kāmanā viṣayaḥ sta gataḥ eva svargaḥ phalam yāga ādeḥ svarga pūta tva ādeḥ ca pitṛ putra gata tvena kāmya tvam iti śrāddha jāta iṣṭi ādeḥ pitṛ putra gatam eva
phalam

original: evañca mātāpitrādigatasvargakāmanayā putrādinā kṛtaṃ puṣkariṇīmahādānādikaṃ mātāpitrādisvargajanakameva
analyzed: evam ca mātā pitṛ ādi gata svarga kāmanayā putra ādinā kṛtam puṣkariṇī mahā dāna ādikam mātā pitṛ ādi svarga janakam eva

original: kāmanāviṣayasvargasādhanatvena teṣāṃ śrutatvāt na hi svagatasvargakāmasya kartavyatāṃ
analyzed: kāmanā viṣaya svarga sādhana tvena teṣām śruta tvāt na hi svagata svarga kāmasya kartavya tām

original: puṣkariṇyādervidhirbodhayati tathā śruteḥ kintu svargakāmasya svargaśca svagataḥ
analyzed: puṣkariṇī ādeḥ vidhiḥ bodhayati tathā śruteḥ kintu svarga kāmasya svargaḥ ca svagataḥ
para gataḥ vā iti svarga kāma tvam aviśiṣṭam yajeta iti ātmanepadam api kart abhipreta kriyā phala mātra janakatve

original: na ca svargakāmo dadyādityādau svagatasvargakāmanāyā antaraṅgatvādautsargikatvācca
analyzed: na ca svarga kāmaḥ dadyāt ityādau svagata svarga kāmanāyāḥ antaraṅga tvāt autsargika tvāt ca

original: svargakāmatvena svagatasvargakāma evocyate sāmānye bādhakaṃ vinā viśeṣaparatve mānābhāvāt /
analyzed: svarga kāma tvena svagata svarga kāmaḥ eva ucyate sāmānye bādhakam vinā viśeṣa paratve māna abhāvāt

original: kecittu samyag gṛhasthāśramaparipālanasya brahmalokāvāptiḥ phalaṃ śrūyata iti jāteṣṭi-pitṛyajñayorapi
analyzed: kecid tu samyak gṛhastha āśrama paripālanasya brahma loka avāptiḥ phalam śrūyate iti jāta iṣṭi pitṛ yajñayoḥ api

original: gṛhasthakarmatvena tadeva phalamiti phalasya kartṛgāmitve niyama eva prātisvikaphalābhiprāyeṇotsarga ityāhuḥ /
analyzed: gṛhastha karma tvena tat eva phalam iti phalasya kartṛ gāmi tve niyamaḥ eva prātisvika phala abhiprāyeṇa utsargaḥ iti āhuḥ

original: nanu yāvannityaparipālanasya tat phalaṃ na tu kāmyaśrāddhādeḥ kāmyāntarbhāve mānābhāvāt yāvat kāmyānuṣṭānāśakteśca /
analyzed: nanu yāvat nitya paripālanasya tat phalam na tu kāmya śrāddha ādeḥ kāmya antarbhāve māna abhāvāt yāvat kāmya anuṣṭāna aśakteḥ ca

original: yāvacchakyānuṣṭhānasyāpi nātrāntarbhāvaḥ kāmanāvirahādināpyakaraṇāt yāvannityānuṣṭhāne tatphalābhāvaprasaṅgāt nityasyaivāvaśyakatvenopasthityānvayācca
analyzed: yāvat śakya anuṣṭhānasya api na atra antarbhāvaḥ kāmanā viraha ādinā api akaraṇāt yāvat nitya anuṣṭhāne tad phala abhāva prasaṅgāt nityasya eva āvaśyaka tvena upasthitya anvayāt ca

original: api ca taiḥ karmabhiḥ pratyekamutpattyapūrvaṃ taiśca paramāpūrvaṃ janyate iti na gauravān mānābhāvācca /
analyzed: api ca taiḥ karmabhiḥ pratyekam utpatti apūrvam taiḥ ca parama apūrvam janyate iti na gauravāt māna abhāvāt ca

original: kintvantimakriyā paripālanarūpakriyāntareṇa veti na sarvaṃ karma brahmalokāvāptiphalakamiti /
analyzed: kintu antima kriyā paripālana rūpa kriyā antareṇa vā iti na sarvam karma brahma loka avāpti phalakam iti
mā evam

original: bhagavaduddeśena kṛtasya kāmyasya nityasya vā yasya kasyāpi karmaṇaḥ paripālanād brahmalokāvāptiḥ phalaṃ śrūyata iti jāteṣṭi-pitṛyajñayorapi  #
analyzed: bhagavat uddeśena kṛtasya kāmyasya nityasya vā yasya kasya api karmaṇaḥ paripālanāt brahma loka avāptiḥ phalam śrūyate iti jāta iṣṭi pitṛyajñayoḥ api
tathā kṛtayoḥ tat eva phalam
tathā ca bhagavadgītā yajñāya ācarataḥ karma karma granthiḥ vilīyate
bibl ind
yajña arthāt karmaṇaḥ yatra lākaḥ yam karma bandhanaḥ

original: iti tacca karma yajñārthatayā pratyekameva tatphalasamarthaṃ sambalanantu maṅgalavadupayujyate anyathā ekaprayogasya vyavadhānādasambhavaḥ  #
analyzed: iti tat ca karma yajña artha tayā pratyekam eva tad phala samartham sambalanan tu maṅgala vat upayujyate anyathā eka prayogasya vyavadhānāt asambhavaḥ
paripālanantu kartavyam iti eva kāraṇam
tat uktam dadāmi deyam iti eva yajñe yaṣṭavyam iti aham iti

original: yattu niṣiddhāsambandha eva samyaktvaṃ na tu vihitamātrānuṣṭhānamiti /
analyzed: yat tu niṣiddha asambandhaḥ eva samyaktvam na tu vihita mātra anuṣṭhānam iti
tat na
yat kiñcid niṣiddha asambandhasya abhāvāt sarva niṣiddha asambandhasya sarvatra sulabha tvāt iti sampradāyaḥ
atra brūmaḥ

original: bhagavaduddeśena kṛtaṃ kiñcideva karma sarvaṃ kāmyaṃ vā sarvaṃ nityaṃ vā sarvamiti
analyzed: bhagavat uddeśena kṛtam kiñcid eva karma sarvam kāmyam vā sarvam nityam vā sarvam iti

original: vā nādyaḥ ekenaiva kāmyena nityena vā snānena tathā kṛtena tatphalasiddhau bahuvittādisādhye
analyzed: vā na ādyaḥ ekena eva kāmyena nityena vā snānena tathā kṛtena tad phala siddhau bahu vitta ādi sādhye
śrāddha ādau apravṛtti āpatteḥ
na aparau aśakya tvāt
na turyaḥ jāta iṣṭi ādeḥ nitya tva abhāvāt

original: tasmāt samyagagṛhasthāśramapālanasya tatphalaṃ samyaktantu sāmastyameva ato gayāśrāddhāderna brahmalokāvāptiḥ phalamiti sādhuktaṃ ``śāstradeśitaṃ  #
analyzed: tasmāt samyak a gṛhastha āśrama pālanasya tat phalam samyaktantu sāmastyam eva atas gayā śrāddha ādeḥ na brahma loka avāptiḥ phalam iti sādhu uktam śāstra deśitam
phalam anuṣṭhātari iti utsargaḥ iti
tat ca phalam kvacid vidhi vākya śrutam kvacid ca ārthavādikam iti
bibl ind
nanu arthavāda ādīnām siddhārtha tayā na prāmāṇyam

original: kāryanvita eva padānāṃ śakyavadhāraṇāt vṛddhavyavahārādeva sarveṣāmādyā vyutpattiḥ upāyāntarasya śabdavyutpattyadhīnatvāt /
analyzed: kāri anvitaḥ eva padānām śaki avadhāraṇāt vṛddha vyavahārāt eva sarveṣām ādyā vyutpattiḥ upāya antarasya śabda vyutpatti adhīna tvāt

original: tathā hi prayojakavākyoccāraṇānantaraṃ prayojyapravṛttimupalabhamāno bālaḥ prekṣāvadvākyoccāraṇasya
analyzed: tathā hi prayojaka vākya uccāraṇa anantaram prayojya pravṛttim upalabhamānaḥ bālaḥ prekṣāvat vākya uccāraṇasya
prayojana jijñāsāyām tad anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt upasthita tvāt ca prayojya vṛddha pravṛttim eva

original: prayojanamavadhārayati na cākiñcit kurvatastādarthyaṃ sambhavatīti tajjanyaṃ pravṛttyanukūlaṃ
analyzed: prayojanam avadhārayati na ca akiñcit kurvataḥ tādarthyam sambhavati iti tat janyam pravṛtti anukūlam

original: kāryatājñānameva kalpayati svapravṛttau ca tena kāryatājñānameva kalpayati svapravṛttau
analyzed: kārya tā jñānam eva kalpayati sva pravṛttau ca tena kārya tā jñānam eva kalpayati sva pravṛttau

original: ca tena kāryatājñānasya hetutvāvadhāraṇāt nānyat pravṛtteḥ kāryatājñānāvaruddhatvāt /
analyzed: ca tena kārya tā jñānasya hetu tva avadhāraṇāt na anyat pravṛtteḥ kārya tā jñāna avaruddha tvāt
bibl ind

original: na caivaṃ śabdasya jñānadvārā pravṛttihetutvaṃ svapravṛttau bālena śabdāhitaviśeṣasya kāryatājñānasya hetutvenānavadhāraṇāt /
analyzed: na ca evam śabdasya jñāna dvārā pravṛtti hetu tvam sva pravṛttau bālena śabda āhita viśeṣasya kārya tā jñānasya hetu tvena anavadhāraṇāt

original: jñāne ca pratyakṣādinānopāyakatvadarśanāt śabdāpi kāryatājñānaheturityavadhārya tatraiva
analyzed: jñāne ca pratyakṣa ādi nānā upāyaka tva darśanāt śabda api kāryatā jñāna hetuḥ iti avadhārya tatra eva

original: śaktiṃ kalpayati upasthitatvāt paścādāvāpoddhāreṇa kriyākārakapadānāṃ kāryānvitatattadartheṣu
analyzed: śaktim kalpayati upasthita tvāt paścāt āvāpa uddhāreṇa kriyā kāraka padānām kārya anvita tad tad artheṣu
śaktim gṛhṇāti prathama grahīta sāmānya śakti anurodhāt
syāt etat yadi api vṛddha vyavahārāt ādau kārya anvita dhīḥ anumitā tathā api anvita mātra śaktyā eva
kāryatā vācaka pada samabhivyāhārāt ākāṅkṣā ādi mahimnā kārya anvita dhī sambhavāt na kārya aṃśe
pi śaktiḥ paramparayā api śabdasya kārya anvita jñāna anukūla tvāt arthāpattau anyathā upapattiḥ api
avaśyam ca ākāṅkṣā ādeḥ kāraṇa tvam kārya aṃśe śaktau api tad vyatirekāt anvita abhidhāna vyatireka niyamāt
bibl ind
sati ca ākāṅkṣā ādau kārya vyatireka darśanāt anvita abhidhāna vyatirikaḥ na kvāpi asti

original: anyathā gavādipadānāṃ vyaktāveva śaktiḥ syāt saṃskārādeva vyaktilābhadarśanānna tatheti
analyzed: anyathā gavādi padānām vyaktau eva śaktiḥ syāt saṃskārāt eva vyakti lābha darśanāt na tathā iti

original: yadi tadā kāryavācakapadādeva kāryānvitalābha iti kiṃ śaktyā vṛddhavyavahāre niyamataḥ
analyzed: yadi tadā kārya vācaka padāt eva kārya anvita lābhaḥ iti kim śaktyā vṛddha vyavahāre niyamataḥ

original: kāryānvitajñānaṃ tatra dṛṣṭamiti tatra śaktikalpane vṛddhavyavahāre śabdopasthāpitenaivānvayabodhadarśanācchabdasannidherevānvayabodhahetutva
analyzed: kārya anvita jñānam tatra dṛṣṭam iti tatra śakti kalpane vṛddha vyavahāre śabda upasthāpitena eva anvaya bodha darśanāt śabda sannidheḥ eva anvaya bodha hetu tva
kalpane dvāram ityādau śabdaḥ eva adhyāhriyate

original: kvacidasampūrṇavākye vṛddhavyavahārādādyavyutpatteḥ śabdasannirvyabhicaratīti cet tarhi siddhārthe 'pyanvayapratītidarśanāt kāryatvamapi vyabhicāri
analyzed: kvacid asampūrṇa vākye vṛddha vyavahārāt ādi avyutpatteḥ śabda sanniḥ vyabhicarati iti ced tarhi siddhārthe pi anvaya pratīti darśanāt kāryatvam api vyabhicāri
na ca tatra lakṣaṇā bādhaka abhāvāt

original: śaktiklapanābhiyā hyanyatra lakṣaṇānumatā iha tu laghīyasyā ubhayasādharaṇāpadārthamātraśaktyā mukhyasyaivocitatvāt /
analyzed: śakti klapanā bhiyā hi anyatra lakṣaṇā anumatā iha tu laghīyasyāḥ ubhaya sādharaṇā padārtha mātra śaktyā mukhyasya eva ucita tvāt

original: kiñca kāryavāciliṅgādīnāṃ ākāṅkṣādyupetapādarthānvitasvārthabodhakatvamavaśyaṃ vācyamato viśeṣāt padāntarāṇāmapi tathātvamastu lāghavāditi
analyzed: kiñca kārya vāci liṅga ādīnām ākāṅkṣā ādi upeta pādartha anvita svārtha bodhaka tvam avaśyam vācyam atas viśeṣāt pada antarāṇām api tathātvam astu lāghavāt iti
mā evam
vyavahāra hetutayā anumite hi kārya anvita jñāne nvaya vyatirekābhyām śabdasya sākṣāt kāraṇa tva avadhārayati

original: na paramparayā sākṣāttvasyautsirgikatvena tatsambhave paramparayā anyāyyatvāditi
analyzed: na paramparayā sākṣāttvasya autsirgika tvena tad sambhave paramparayā anyāyya tvāt iti

original: tatraiva śaktiṃ kalpayati nānvitajñāne padārthajñāne vā apravartakatayā pravṛttyā
analyzed: tatra eva śaktim kalpayati na anvita jñāne padārtha jñāne vā apravartaka tayā pravṛttyā
sva kāraṇa tvena tayoḥ anupasthāpanāt

original: na cānvitajñānaśaktāvapi paramparayā kāryatvadhīḥ sambhavatītyarthāpattyā saiva kalpyatāṃ lāghavāt na tu viśiṣṭajñāne śaktiranyalabhyatvāt  #
analyzed: na ca anvita jñāna śaktau api paramparayā kāryatva dhīḥ sambhavati iti arthāpattyā sā eva kalpyatām lāghavāt na tu viśiṣṭa jñāne śaktiḥ anya labhya tvāt
iti vācyam
arthāpatteḥ sākṣāt upapādaka mātra viṣaya tvena nyūna adhika a grāhaka tvāt sākṣāt upapādaka kāri anvita jñāne

original: śaktiḥ kalpyate liṅgādīnāṃ śakteralpanāt anyalabhyatvatarkasyāpyabhāvāt vā ādyavyutpattervicāryatvāt /
analyzed: śaktiḥ kalpyate liṅga ādīnām śakteḥ alpanāt anya labhya tva tarkasya api abhāvāt vā ādya vyutpatteḥ vicārya tvāt

original: kiñca pravṛttikāraṇatayopasthitaṃ kāryanvitajñānamapahāyānupasthitānvitajñānamātre śaktikalpanamayuktaṃ hetvabhāvādupasthityantare ca gauravāt
analyzed: kiñca pravṛtti kāraṇatayā upasthitam kāri anvita jñānam apahāya anupasthita anvita jñāna mātre śakti kalpanam ayuktam hetu abhāvāt upasthiti antare ca gauravāt
atha kāri anvita jñāna upasthitau api anvita jñānam api upasthitam iti lāghavāt kārya aṃśam apahāya anvite

original: śaktirgṛhyatāmiti cet na jñāne hi padānāṃ śaktiḥ śakyatvānnārtheṣu anyacca kāryānvitajñānaṃ
analyzed: śaktiḥ gṛhyatām iti ced na jñāne hi padānām śaktiḥ śakya tvāt na artheṣu anyat ca kārya anvita jñānam
anyat eva anvita jñānam viṣaya bhedena jñāna bhedāt

original: taduktamabhāvavāde anyadbhūtalajñānamanyacca ghaṭavadbhūtalajñānamiti anvitajñānamupasthāpya tatra śaktigraha iti gauravameva /
analyzed: tat uktam abhāva vāde anyat bhū tala jñānam anyat ca ghaṭa vat bhū tala jñānam iti anvita jñānam upasthāpya tatra śakti grahaḥ iti gauravam eva

original: gaghuni śakye sambhavatyanyalabhyaṃ guru na tatheti cet na yugapadupasthitau tathātvāt /
analyzed: gaghuni śakye sambhavati anya labhyam guru na tathā iti ced na yugapad upasthitau tathātvāt

original: na ca tasyāpyanupasthitiḥ puruṣaviśeṣadoṣāt sarvairevādyavyutpattau tathānavagamāt /
analyzed: na ca tasya api anupasthitiḥ puruṣa viśeṣa doṣāt sarvaiḥ eva ādi avyutpattau tathā anavagamāt

original: tathāpi na kāryānvite śaktiḥ kāryavāciliṅgādīnāṃ vyabhicārāditi cet na sarvapadānāṃ kāryatvaviśiṣṭadhījanakatvāt /
analyzed: tathā api na kārya anvite śaktiḥ kārya vāci liṅga ādīnām vyabhicārāt iti ced na sarva padānām kāryatva viśiṣṭa dhī janaka tvāt
tat ca kārya anvita sva artha a pratipādaka tayā itara anvita sva artha kārya pratipādaka tayā vā iti
evam ca kārya anvita vyutpattau satyām anākāṅkṣā ādau vyabhicārāt ākāṅkṣā ādeḥ upādhi tvam
tathā ca upajīvya prathama bhāvi kārya anvita vyutpatti anurodhena vidhi aśrutau api kāri adhyāhāraḥ
kvacid lakṣaṇā kvacid a saṃsarga agrahaḥ iti siddhārthe nvaya pratīti darśanāt uttara kālam anvita mātre

original: śaktireva kalpyatāṃ prācīnakāryānvitajñānaṃ bādhyatāmityapyata eva nirastam /
analyzed: śaktiḥ eva kalpyatām prācīna kārya anvita jñānam bādhyatām iti api atas eva nirastam

original: pūrvakalpanātaḥ kalpanāntaraprasaṅgāt uttarakālabhāvisiddhārthaprayogasya lakṣaṇādibhirapyupapatteḥ ananyathāsiddhatvābhāvena prācīnajñānābādhakatvāt  #
analyzed: pūrva kalpanātaḥ kalpanā antara prasaṅgāt uttara kāla bhāvi siddha artha prayogasya lakṣaṇa ādibhiḥ api upapatteḥ ananyathā siddha tva abhāvena prācīna jñāna ābādhaka tvāt  /
upajīvya vyāghātāt ca

original: atha siddhārthe 'pi vyutpattiḥ tathāhi upalabdhacaitraputrajanmā bālastādṛśenaiva
analyzed: atha siddhārthe vyutpattiḥ tathā hi upalabdha caitra putra janmā bālaḥ tādṛśena eva

original: vārtāhāreṇa samaṃ caitrasamīpaṃ gataścaiva putraste jāta iti vārtāhāravākyaṃ śṛṇvan
analyzed: vārtāhāreṇa samam caitra samīpam gataḥ ca eva putraḥ te jātaḥ iti vārtāhāra vākyam śṛṇvan

original: caitrasya mukhaprasādaṃ gṛhṇan śroturharṣamanuminoti hārṣācca tatkāraṇaṃ putrajanmajñānaṃ
analyzed: caitrasya mukha prasādam gṛhṇan śrotuḥ harṣam anuminoti hārṣāt ca tad kāraṇam putra janma jñānam

original: kalpayati upasthitvādupapādakatvāda nyopasthitau gauravācca tatra vākyasya kāraṇatāṃ
analyzed: kalpayati nya upasthitau gauravāt ca tatra vākyasya kāraṇatām

original: kalpayati lāghavāditi cet na harṣahetūnāṃ bahūnāṃ sambhavāt harṣeṇa liṅgena putrajanmajñānasya
analyzed: kalpayati lāghavāt iti ced na harṣa hetūnām bahūnām sambhavāt harṣeṇa liṅgena putra janma jñānasya
bālena anumātum aśakya tvāt priya antara jñānasya pariśeṣayitum aśakya tvāt ca
atha putra janma jñāna avyabhicāri vṛddhi nāddha ādi kriyā viśeṣa darśanāt putra janma jñāna anumānam iti

original: cet tarhi putraste jāta iti vākyaṃ tat kriyākartavyaparameveti kāryānvitajñānajanakatvameva
analyzed: ced tarhi putraḥ te jātaḥ iti vākyam tat kriyā kartavya param eva iti kārya anvita jñāna janaka tvam eva

original: tasya prathamato gṛhyate uttarakālaṃ putrajanmajñānānumānamiti na vyutpattiḥ kāryaṃ
analyzed: tasya prathamatas gṛhyate uttara kālam putra janma jñāna anumānam iti na vyutpattiḥ kāryam

original: jahāti yatrāpīha sahakāratarau madhuraṃ piko rautīti prasiddhārthapadasamānādhikaraṇyādibhirvyutpattistatrāpi
analyzed: jahāti yatra api iha sahakāratarau madhuram pikaḥ rauti iti prasiddha artha pada samānādhikaraṇya ādibhiḥ vyutpattiḥ tatra api

original: vyavahāradhīnyutpattipūrvikā kāryānvita eva yuktā pikapadaśaktiḥ pūrvaṃ nāvadhṛteti
analyzed: vyavahāra dhīnī utpatti pūrvikā kārya anvite eva yuktā pika pada śaktiḥ pūrvam na avadhṛtā iti

original: cet na tatra pikamānayetyādau kasyacit kāryānvita eva vyutpatteḥ upajīvyajātītayā
analyzed: ced na tatra pikam ānaya ityādau kasyacid kārya anvite eva vyutpatteḥ upajīvya jātī tayā

original: ca tasyā balavattvaṃ kiñcedamapi kāryānvitajñānaśaktaṃ padatvāditi sāmānyato 'vagataṃ
analyzed: ca tasyāḥ balavat tvam kiñca idam api kārya anvita jñāna śaktam pada tvāt iti sāmānyatas vagatam

original: svārthāviśeṣaḥ paraṃ nādhigataḥ sa idānīṃ suhṛdupadeśādibhiravagamyate /
analyzed: svārtha aviśeṣaḥ param na adhigataḥ saḥ idānīm suhṛd upadeśa ādibhiḥ avagamyate

original: ataḥ siddhaṃ pravṛttiparāṇāṃ śabdānāṃ pravartakajñānajanakatvaṃ tacca kvacit sākṣāt kāryānvayāt kvacit paramparayā kāryānvayāt ata eva vidhiśeṣībhūtārthavādānāṃ
analyzed: atas siddham pravṛtti parāṇām śabdānām pravartaka jñāna janaka tvam tat ca kvacid sākṣāt kārya anvayāt kvacid paramparayā kārya anvayāt atas eva vidhi śeṣībhūta artha vādānām
svarga ādi pada śakti grāhakāṇām ca pravṛtti paratvena paramparayā kārya anvayāt kārya anvita sva artha ābodhaka tvam iti
yatra purāṇa bhārata ādi pāṭhe phala śrutiḥ asti tatra arthavāda kalpita vidhi śeṣībhūta tvena
pravṛtti para tvam eva teṣām ati paramparayā kārya anvita sva artha bodhaka tvam svarūpa ākhyāna parāṇām tu

original: kāvya-nāṭakādīnāṃ padārthāsaṃsargāgraheṇa saṃsargavyavahāro na saṃsargagraha iti /
analyzed: kāvya nāṭaka ādīnām padārtha a saṃsarga agraheṇa saṃsarga vyavahāraḥ na saṃsarga grahe iti
bibl ind
atrā ucyate ghaṭam ānaya iti vākya śravaṇa anantaram prayojyasya dhaṭa ānayana gocara pravṛttyā

original: ghaṭānayanakāryatājñānamanumitaṃ bālena na tu kāryānvitajñānaṃ pravṛttiviśeṣe tasyāhetutvādghaṭādipadaśaktigrahe tasyānupayogācca /
analyzed: ghaṭa ānayana kārya tā jñānam anumitam bālena na tu kārya anvita jñānam pravṛtti viśeṣe tasya ahetu tvāt ghaṭa ādi pada śakti grahe tasya anupayogāt ca
tatra tad jñāna viśeṣe ghaṭam ānaya iti vākya viśeṣasya an ākalita pada vibhāgasya hetu tvam avadhārya
ghaṭa pada dvitīyā dhātu vidhi pratyayānām pratyekam āvāpa udvāpa dvāreṇa ghaṭa karma tva ānayana
kārya tva jñāneṣu pratyekam kāraṇa tvam avagamya śaktim kalpayati
paścāt pravṛtti sāmānyena anumita kārya anvita jñāna vākya mātrasya anya labhya tvena kārya aṃśam apahāya anvita jñāna mātre

original: śaktiṃ kalpayati na tu prathamaṃ vākyamātrasya kāryānvitajñānamātrahetutvakalpanaṃ /
analyzed: śaktim kalpayati na tu prathamam vākya mātrasya kārya anvita jñāna mātra hetu tva kalpanam

original: atha ghaṭānayanakriyāyāḥ prathamaṃ kriyātvajñānātpravṛttimātrānumānaṃ tena ca kāryānvitajñānamanumāya
analyzed: atha ghaṭa ānayana kriyāyāḥ prathamam kriyā tva jñānāt pravṛtti mātra anumānam tena ca kārya anvita jñānam anumāya

original: tatra vākyamātrasya hetutvaṃ kalpayitvā śaktiṃ kalpayati taduttaraṃ viśeṣayoḥ kārya-kāraṇabhāvadhīriti
analyzed: tatra vākya mātrasya hetu tvam kalpayitvā śaktim kalpayati tat uttaram viśeṣayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva dhīḥ iti
ced na prathamam pravṛtti mātra kārya anvita jñāna mātrayoḥ anumānam bālasya kramaśas bhavati iti atra
māna abhāvāt ghaṭa ādi pada śakti grahasya tena vinā api sambhavāt
na ca tad anumāna sāmagrī tad āvṛttā iti vācyam
tadā vyāpti ādi smṛtau māna abhāvāt

original: sāmānyayoḥ kārya-kāraṇabhāvagraho viśeṣayostathātvagrahe heturiti cet na viśeṣayoranvaya-vyatirekābhyāmeva tadgrahāt /
analyzed: sāmānyayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva grahaḥ viśeṣayoḥ tathātva grahe hetuḥ iti ced na viśeṣayoḥ anvaya vyatirekābhyām eva tad grahāt
yathā dhūma vahni viśeṣayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva grahe tad sāmānyayoḥ api hetu hetumat bhāvaḥ

original: bhāsate anyathā na sakṛddarśanagamyā vyāptiḥ syāt tathātrāpi viśeṣayoḥ kārya-kāraṇabhāvavittivedya
analyzed: bhāsate anyathā na sakṛt darśana gamyā vyāptiḥ syāt tathā atra api viśeṣayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva vitti vedya

original: eva sāmānyayostathābhāva iti cet na pratyakṣeṇa viśeṣagrahe yogyatvāt sāmānyamapi
analyzed: eva sāmānyayoḥ tathā bhāvaḥ iti ced na pratyakṣeṇa viśeṣa grahe yogya tvāt sāmānyam api

original: bhāsate prakṛte ca kāryaviśeṣeṇa kāraṇaviśeṣānumitau na sāmānyamiti na yugapadupasthitiḥ /
analyzed: bhāsate prakṛte ca kārya viśeṣeṇa kāraṇa viśeṣa anumitau na sāmānyam iti na yugapad upasthitiḥ

original: atha viśeṣayoḥ kārya-kāraṇabhāvāt sāmānyayorapi tathātvamanumāpayatīti cet tarhi
analyzed: atha viśeṣayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt sāmānyayoḥ api tathātvam anumāpayati iti ced tarhi

original: viśeṣayoḥ kārya-kāraṇabhāvāvagamaḥ prāthamika iti tanmūlakaḥ prathamaṃ padaviśeṣe
analyzed: viśeṣayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva avagamaḥ prāthamikaḥ iti tad mūlakaḥ prathamam pada viśeṣe

original: śaktigraha eva syāt niṣprayojanakatvenāntarānumitau mānābhāvāt yaccoktaṃ pravṛttikāraṇatayopasthitaṃ
analyzed: śakti grahaḥ eva syāt niṣprayojanaka tvena antara anumitau māna abhāvāt yat ca uktam pravṛtti kāraṇatayā upasthitam
kārya anvita jñānam apahāya anvita jñānam kalpayitvā tatra śakti kalpanam ayuktam

original: gauravāditi tanna kāryānvitajñāne 'nvitajñānatvasya sattvāt tadviśeṣatvāt tasya atastatraiva
analyzed: gauravāt iti tat na kārya anvita jñāne nvita jñāna tvasya sattvāt tad viśeṣa tvāt tasya atas tatra eva
śakti grahaḥ na kāryatva aṃśe pi

original: ata eva ghaṭavadbhūtalajñāne bhūtalajñānanatvamapīti tadbhinnaṃ tajjñānamabhāvavyavahāre kāraṇaṃ tvayāpi svīkṛtaṃ /
analyzed: atas eva ghaṭa vat bhū tala jñāne bhū tala jñānana tvam api iti tat bhinnam tat jñānam abhāva vyavahāre kāraṇam tvayā api svīkṛtam

original: astyevaṃ kintu tadupasthitāvapyanvitajñānatvaṃ na viṣaya iti tasyaivopasthityantaraṃ
analyzed: asti evam kintu tad upasthitau api anvita jñāna tvam na viṣaye iti tasya eva upasthiti antaram

original: kalpyamiti cet na kāryānvitajñāne anvitajñānaṃ viśeṣyamiti tadupasthitau tasyāpi
analyzed: kalpyam iti ced na kārya anvita jñāne anvita jñānam viśeṣyam iti tad upasthitau tasya api
viṣaya tvāt viśiṣṭa jñāna sāmagrītaḥ viśeṣya bhāna avaśyambhāvāt anyathā anyat jāti jñānam

original: anyacca jātiviśiṣṭajñānamiti vyaktijñānamapahāya jātijñānaṃ kvāpi nopasthitamiti
analyzed: anyat ca jāti viśiṣṭa jñānam iti vyakti jñānam apahāya jāti jñānam kvāpi na upasthitam iti

original: na tava jātireva padārthaḥ syāt jāteḥ kevalopasthitau ca vyaktisamānasaṃvit saṃvedyatvaṃ na syāt /
analyzed: na tava jātiḥ eva padārthaḥ syāt jāteḥ kevala upasthitau ca vyakti samāna saṃvid saṃvedya tvam na syāt
atha jāti viśiṣṭa jñāna upasthiteḥ vya vyakti jñāna viṣaya tve pi gauravāt vyakteḥ anya labhya tvāt ca

original: jātiviśiṣṭajñānatvaṃ na śakyatāvacchedakaṃ kintu jātijñānatvaṃ lāghavāditi mataṃ tarhi tulyam /
analyzed: jāti viśiṣṭa jñāna tvam na śakya tā avacchedakam kintu jāti jñāna tvam lāghavāt iti matam tarhi tulyam

original: na ca yugapadupasthitau lāghavāvatārona cātra yugapadupasthitiriti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca yugapad upasthitau lāghava avatāraḥ na ca atra yugapad upasthitiḥ iti vācyam

original: viśiṣṭajñānasya viśeṣyaviṣayatvaniyamāt kiñca mamedaṃ kāryamiti jñānaṃ sākṣādupapādakaṃ
analyzed: viśiṣṭa jñānasya viśeṣya viṣaya tva niyamāt kiñca mama idam kāryam iti jñānam sākṣāt upapādakam
pravṛttyā sva kāraṇatvena anumitam atas tatra śaktim gṛhṇīyāt sākṣāt upapādaka viṣayatvāt
kalpanāyāḥ śaktim gṛhṇīyāt sākṣāt upapādaka viṣaya tvāt kalpanāyāḥ
na tu idam kārya jñāne tasya sākṣāt upapādaka tvāt

original: athedaṃ kāryamitijñāne śaktyaiva paramparayānumānadvārā mamedaṃ kāryamiti jñānasambhavāt
analyzed: atha idam kāryam iti jñāne śaktyā eva paramparayā anumāna dvārā mama idam kāryam iti jñāna sambhavāt

original: anyalabhyatvena na śaktikalpanā tarhi itarānvitajñānaśaktyaiva kāryavācakapadasamabhivyāhārāreṇaiva
analyzed: anya labhya tvena na śakti kalpanā tarhi itara anvita jñāna śaktyā eva kārya vācaka pada samabhivyāhāra āreṇa eva

original: kāryānvitajñānasambhavāt anyalabhyatvena na tatra śaktikalpanamiti tulyam /
analyzed: kārya anvita jñāna sambhavāt anya labhya tvena na tatra śakti kalpanam iti tulyam

original: nanvidaṃ kāryamiti jñānaṃ sākṣādeva pravartakaṃ kartavyatāprayojakayāvadekaviśeṣaṇasya svagatatvapratisandhānaṃ sahakāri tena nātiprasaṅgaḥ
analyzed: nanu idam kāryam iti jñānam sākṣāt eva pravartakam kartavya tā prayojaka yāvat eka viśeṣaṇasya svagata tva pratisandhānam sahakāri tena na atiprasaṅgaḥ

original: na ca sahakārivilambena kāryānutpāde sākṣātsādhanatvaṃ nivartata iti cet na lāghavena
analyzed: na ca sahakāri vilambena kārya anutpāde sākṣāt sādhana tvam nivartate iti ced na lāghavena

original: mamedaṃ kāryamiti jñānādeva pravṛtteḥ yathā ca bhaviṣyadviṣayā kāryatānumitistasthoktamadhastāt /
analyzed: mama idam kāryam iti jñānāt eva pravṛtteḥ yathā ca bhaviṣyat viṣayā kāryatā anumitiḥ tasthā uktam adhastāt

original: api ca yādṛśasya puruṣasyāvigītakṛtisādhyamidaṃ tādṛśo 'hamiti dhīrna pravṛttihetuḥ
analyzed: api ca yādṛśasya puruṣasya avigīta kṛti sādhyam idam tādṛśaḥ ham iti dhīḥ na pravṛtti hetuḥ
kṛta kriyamāṇa viṣayaka kṛti sādhya tā jñānasya siddha viṣayasya asiddha viṣaya icchā anutpādaka tvāt
icchāyāḥ sva prakāraka dhī sādhya tvena kṛtyā sādhayāmi iti icchāyāḥ sva prakāra dhī sādhya tvena
kṛtyā sādhayāmi iti icchāyāḥ sva kṛti anantara bhaviṣyat tā rūpa kṛti sādhya tā dhī janya tvāt ca
api ca astu prathamam kārya anvita jñāne vākyasya

original: sākṣātatkāraṇatābodhāttatra śaktigrahaḥ tathāpi paścādāvāpodvāreṇa padaviśeṣasyetarānvitasvārthajñāne śaktiṃ kalpayati lāghavāt /
analyzed: sākṣā tad kāraṇatā bodhāt tatra śakti grahaḥ tathā api paścāt āvāpa udvāreṇa pada viśeṣasya itara anvita svārtha jñāne śaktim kalpayati lāghavāt
na tu kāryatva aṃśe gauravāt anya labhyāt ca

original: na caivaṃ prathamapravṛttasya sākṣātkāraṇatābodhasya tanmūlakakāryānvitaśaktigrahasya ca bādhā syāditi vācyam /
analyzed: na ca evam prathama pravṛttasya sākṣāt kāraṇatā bodhasya tad mūlaka kārya anvita śakti grahasya ca bādhā syāt iti vācyam

original: iṣṭatvāt anyathāsiddhimapaśyato hi bālasya sa bhūta iti tasyābalavattvāt gauravānyalabhyatva-tarka-sahakṛtapramāṇajanyatvenottarasya balavattvāt
analyzed: iṣṭa tvāt anyathā siddhim apaśyataḥ hi bālasya sa bhūtaḥ iti tasya abalavat tvāt gaurava anya labhya tva tarka sahakṛta pramāṇa janya tvena uttarasya balavat tvāt
na ca upajīvya bādhāt na tathā vācyam
upajīvya tve māna abhāvāt

original: daivāddhi prathamaṃ tadvṛttaṃ na tu padaviśeṣaśaktigrahe tasya hetutvatena vināpi tatsambhavāt /
analyzed: daivāt hi prathamam tat vṛttam na tu pada viśeṣa śakti grahe tasya hetu tva tena vinā api tad sambhavāt
na ca prāthamika tvena balat tvasya vyabhicārāt

original: nāpi sarvaiḥ prathamaṃ pratīyamānatvena balavattvaṃ sarveṣā śarīrāhampratyaye candratārakādiparimāṇasya sarvairalpatvagrahe ca vyabhicārāt
analyzed: nā api sarvaiḥ prathamam pratīyamāna tvena balavat tvam sarveṣām śarīra ahampratyaye candra tārakā ādi parimāṇasya sarvaiḥ alpa tva grahe ca vyabhicārāt
atas eva pūrva kalpanātaḥ kalpanā antara prasaṅgaḥ syāt iti
nirastam
yatra ananyathāsiddha tayā upajīvya tayā vā balat tvam pūrva kalpanāyāḥ tatra tathātvāt

original: kiñca prathamaṃ kāryānvitajñāne vākyasya sākṣāt parampodāsīnaṃ kāraṇatvamātraṃ gṛhyate
analyzed: kiñca prathamam kārya anvita jñāne vākyasya sākṣāt kāraṇa tva mātram gṛhyate
na tu upāyasya anvaya vyatireka ādeḥ ubhaya viśeṣa sādhāraṇa tvena tad saṃśayaka tvāt
utsargaḥ pi bādhaka abhāva niścaya sahakṛtaḥ niścāyakaḥ

original: na cānyalabhyatvasya bādhakasyābhāvamāpātataḥ svato darśanamātreṇa bālo niścetumarhati /
analyzed: na ca anya labhya tvasya bādhakasya abhāvam āpātataḥ svatas darśana mātreṇa bālaḥ niścetum arhati

original: ata eva prāmāṇyasyautsargikatve 'pi bādhakābhāvasahakṛtaniścayādeva niścayaḥ anyathā pramāpramā vā sākṣātparamparāsādhanaṃ veti saṃśayaḥ kvāpi  #
analyzed: atas eva prāmāṇyasya autsargika tve pi bādhaka abhāva sahakṛta niścayāt eva niścayaḥ anyathā pramā apramā vā sākṣāt paramparā sādhanam vā iti saṃśayaḥ kvāpi
na syāt
yat ca harṣa hetūnām bahūnām sambhavāt ityādi tat na svatas hīta harṣa hetu stana pāna ādeḥ bādhā avatāra danyasya
harṣa hetoḥ agrahāt upasthita tvāt upapādaka tvāt ca putra janma jñānasya eva harṣa hetu tvena kalpanāt

original: anyapriyajñānaṃ harṣakāraṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti śaṅkāyāḥ kathamevamiti cet na evaṃ hi kāryānvitajñāne
analyzed: anya priya jñānam harṣa kāraṇam bhaviṣyati iti śaṅkāyāḥ katham evam iti ced na evam hi kārya anvita jñāne
pi śaktiḥ na gṛhyate prayojya jñāna hetūnām bahu tvāt ananyathā siddha śabda anuvidhānasya

original: ca tulyatvāt anyapriyasyājñānācca jñāne 'pi vā tadā tadupasthitiniyame mānābhāvāt
analyzed: ca tulya tvāt anya priyasya ajñānāt ca jñāne vā tadā tad upasthiti niyame māna abhāvāt
sandeha abhāva upapatteḥ liṅga ābhāsa janya kākatālīya sampanna saṃvāda anumiti vaddha harṣeṇa
liṅgena putra janma jñāna anumāna sambhavāt ca

original: na cāsāsajatvenānumiterbhramatve taddhetukaśaktigraho bhramaḥ viṣayasya tathābhāvena tayoryathārthatvāt /
analyzed: na ca asāsa ja tvena anumiteḥ bhrama tve tad hetuka śaktigrahaḥ bhramaḥ viṣayasya tathā bhāvena tayoḥ yathārtha tvāt

original: yathā kaścit sūtrasañcārādhiṣṭhitaṃ dāruputrakaṃ ghaṭamānayeti niyuṅke sa ca tamānayati tadā cetanavyavahārādiva taddarśī bālo vyutpadyate
analyzed: yathā kaścid sūtra sañcāra dhiṣṭhitam dāru putrakam ghaṭam ānaya iti niyuṅke sa ca tam ānayati tadā cetana vyavahārāt iva tad darśī bālaḥ vyutpadyate

original: iyaṃ kriyā kṛtijanyā sā jñānajanyā tat vākyajanyamityunumiti paramparāyā bhramatve
analyzed: iyam kriyā kṛti janyā sā jñāna janyā tat vākya janyam iti unumiti paramparāyāḥ bhrama tve

original: 'pi taddhetuśaktigrahaḥ tajjanyaśābdabodhaśca yathārtha eva viṣayasya tathābhāvāditi
analyzed: tad hetu śakti grahaḥ tad janya śābda bodhaḥ ca yathārthaḥ eva viṣayasya tathā bhāvāt iti
siddham siddhārthe pi śakti grahe iti

original: ata eva ``yanna duḥkhena sambhinnaṃ na ca grastamanantaraṃ /
analyzed: atas eva yat na duḥkhena sambhinnam na ca grastam anantaram
abhilāṣa upapanītam ca tat sukham svar pada āspadam

original: ityarthavādopasthite sukhe vedādeva svargapadasya śaktigrahaḥ na tu candanādau sukhoparāgeṇa
analyzed: iti arthavāda upasthite sukhe vedāt eva svarga padasya śakti grahaḥ na tu candana ādau sukha uparāgeṇa
svarga pada prayogāt heya tā daśāyām ca a prayogāt sukham eva śakyam bahu vitta vyaya āyāsa sādhye

original: tatkarmaṇi sukhamātrārthī na pravartata ityarthavādopasthite svargapadatātparyaṃ /
analyzed: tad karmaṇi sukha mātra arthī na pravartate iti arthavāda upasthite svarga pada tātparyam

original: na cārthavādasyopajīvyatvāt tadunīte tata eva śaktigrahaḥ tasya svargapadatātparyaviṣayatvenāspadatvopapatterna atiśayitasukhatvaṃ vācyaṃ prayogopādhirvātiśayaḥ
analyzed: na ca arthavādasya upajīvya tvāt tad unīte tatas eva śakti grahaḥ tasya svarga pada tātparya viṣaya tvena āspada tva upapatteḥ na atiśayita sukha tvam vācyam prayoga upādhiḥ vā atiśayaḥ

original: na cātiśayasya sāvadhitvena candanasukhe 'smādayaṃ svarga iti dhīḥ syāt rasādāvivātiśayasya jātitvenāvadhyanirūpyatvāt /
analyzed: na ca atiśayasya sāvadhi tvena candana sukhe smāt ayam svargaḥ iti dhīḥ syāt rasa ādau iva atiśayasya jāti tvena avadhya nirūpya tvāt

original: atiśayapadaprayogastu itarajñānāpekṣa iti cet na vicitrahetusādhyatayā vilakṣaṇātiśayasyānekatvenānanugamāt
analyzed: atiśaya pada prayogaḥ tu itara jñāna apekṣaḥ iti ced na vicitra hetu sādhyatayā vilakṣaṇa atiśayasya aneka tvena ananugamāt
sukha tva avāntara atiśaya tvena asya anugame pi anadhyavasāyena śakti agrahāt apravṛtti āpatteḥ

original: sukhatvāvāntarajāteśca sukhamātrasādhāraṇatvāt prayogopādhernirākartavyatvāt loke ca lakṣaṇā /
analyzed: sukhatva avāntara jāteḥ ca sukha mātra sādhāraṇa tvāt prayoga upādheḥ nirākartavya tvāt loke ca lakṣaṇā

original: nanu duḥkhāsambhinnasukhasya śakyatve candanādau svargapadaprayogolakṣaṇayāpi na
analyzed: nanu duḥkha asambhinna sukhasya śakya tve candana ādau svarga pada prayogaḥ lakṣaṇayā api na

original: syāt sātiśayasukhasya śakyatve tatsambandhitayā candanādau lakṣaṇā bhavati tasmāt
analyzed: syāt sātiśaya sukhasya śakya tve tad sambandhi tayā candana ādau lakṣaṇā bhavati tasmāt

original: duḥkhāsambhinnatvādinopalakṣitā sukhatvāvāntarajātireva vācyā ekajātisattve 'pi vilakṣaṇahetusādhyasvargeṣṭhakajātau mānābhāvāt /
analyzed: duḥkha asambhinna tva ādinā upalakṣitā sukha tva avāntara jātiḥ eva vācyā eka jāti sattve pi vilakṣaṇa hetu sādhya svargeṣṭhaka jātau māna abhāvāt

original: vihitakarmajanyatā ca tattadviśeṣatvenaiva ananugatasyāpi janyatāvacchedakatvāt sambandhamātrañca lakṣaṇābījamiti vakṣyate /
analyzed: vihita karma janya tā ca tad tad viśeṣa tvena eva ananugatasya api janya tā avacchedaka tvāt sambandha mātram ca lakṣaṇā bījam iti vakṣyate

original: evaṃ devatāyāmapi ``indramupāsītetyādau lāke prayogasyāniyamāt gauṇatayaiva vyavahārāccārthānadhyavasāye
analyzed: evam devatāyām api indram upāsīta ityādau lāke prayogasya aniyamāt gauṇa tayā eva vyavahārāt ca artha anadhyavasāye
laukika sahasrākṣa ādau indra ādi pada śakti grahaḥ pramāṇam ca indraḥ sahasrākṣaḥ ityādiḥ vidhi sabh abhivyāhṛta ūrthavādaḥ eva svarga pada vat
atha svarga pade pravṛtti anyathā anupapattyā tat sukham svar pada āspadam iti śruteḥ ca arthavādāt eva

original: śaktigrahaḥ na ceha tathārthavādaḥ kintu ``indraḥ sahasrākṣa ityādi stāvakatvena
analyzed: śakti grahaḥ na ca iha tathā arthavādaḥ kintu indraḥ sahasrākṣaḥ ityādi stāvaka tvena
pravṛtti param iti ced na indraḥ sahasrākṣaḥ ityādi prasiddha pada sāmānādhikaraṇya śrutau
bādhakam vinā sahasrākṣasya eva indra ādi pada vācyatva avadhāraṇāt prasiddha pada samanva balena
pratīyamānam artham abādhitam ādāya eva teṣām pravartaka tvāt
mantra prakāśita śaśiśekhara ādi upetam uddiśya haviḥ tyāgena tatra eva yājñikānām devatā vyavahārāt

original: api ca ``śivāya gāṃ dadyādityādinā devatāsampradānatvaśruteḥ śivādisahasranāmnāṃ
analyzed: api ca śivāya gām dadyāt ityādinā devatā sampradāna tva śruteḥ śiva ādi sahasranāmnām
paryāya tvena śruteḥ mahājana parigraheṇa pramāṇa tvāt ārādhita devatāyām vara dātṛ tva śruteḥ ca
bādhakam vinā cetanā eva devatā
atha devatā caitanya pakṣe

original: tatprītireva yāgavyāpāra iti nāpūrvasiddhiriti cet na prīteḥ sukhasya tadanubhavasya
analyzed: tad prītiḥ eva yāga vyāpāraḥ iti na apūrva siddhiḥ iti ced na prīteḥ sukhasya tad anubhavasya
ca āśutara vināśi tvāt tad janya saṃskārasya sva aviṣaye phala ahetu tvāt phala hetu sthāyi kṛti vyāpāra apekṣāyām

original: nānāyāgeṣṭakadāhvāne caikadā sannidhānaṃ tadbaddhiviśeṣa eva pratiṣṭhāvidhinā pratimādāvahaṅkāravat /
analyzed: nānā yāga iṣṭakadāhvāne ca ekadā sannidhānam tad baddhi viśeṣaḥ eva pratiṣṭhā vidhinā pratimā ādau ahaṅkāra vat

original: atha rājasūyādiphalatvena śraterindrādiścetana eva devatātvantu tasya nāsti mānābhāvāt
analyzed: atha rājasūya ādi phalatvena śrateḥ indra ādiḥ cetanaḥ eva devatā tvan tu tasya na asti māna abhāvāt
kintu

original: devatā ata evāgniprakāśakamantreṇāgniprakāśanānantaraṃ agnaya iti niyamato havisastyāgo na paryāyāntareṇa /
analyzed: devatāḥ atas eva agni prakāśaka mantreṇa agni prakāśana anantaram agnaye iti niyamataḥ havisaḥ tyāgaḥ na paryāya antareṇa

original: na cendroddeśena havisastyāga indraniṣṭhakiñcijjanakaḥ tatsvarūpājanakatve sati taduddeśena kriyamāṇatvāt brāhmaṇāya dānavaditi vācyam /
analyzed: na ca indra uddeśena havisaḥ tyāgaḥ indra niṣṭha kiñcid janakaḥ tad svarūpa ajanaka tve sati tad uddeśena kriyamāṇa tvāt brāhmaṇāya dāna vat iti vācyam
aprayojaka tvāt tad artha tvena kriyamāṇa tvasya upādhi tvāt ca

original: indrāya svāhetyatra na tādarthye caturthī kintu svāhādipadayoge upapadavibhaktireva anyathā ``namaḥ-svasti-svāhetyādisūtravaiyarthyāt /
analyzed: indrāya svāhā iti atra na tādarthye caturthī kintu svāhā ādi pada yoge upapada vibhaktiḥ eva anyathā namaḥ svasti svāhā ityādi sūtra vaiyarthyāt
mā evam

original: caturthyantapadasya devatātve mānābhāvāt caturthīṃ vināpi indro devateti vyavahārāt /
analyzed: caturthī anta padasya devatā tve māna abhāvāt caturthīm vinā api indraḥ devatā iti vyavahārāt
agraye kavyavāhanāya ityādau devatā dvaya prasaṅgāt indraḥ sahasra kṣaḥ iti arthavādasya
indram upāsīta ityādi vidhi samabhivyāhāreṇa ekavākyatayā tasya eva upāya syatvāt śiva svat ādadīta iti atra
mahādevam uddiśya tyakte śiṣṭānām śiva sva tvena vyavahārāt ca

original: agnaya iti padena niyamatastyāgaśrutibodhitatvena tathā tyāgasya phalahetutvāt /
analyzed: agnaye iti padena niyamatas tyāga śruti bodhita tvena tathā tyāgasya phala hetu tvāt

original: na ca bījākṣarāṇāṃ devatātvāt tatraiva śivādipadaśaktigraha iti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca bīja akṣarāṇām devatā tvāt tatra eva śiva ādi pada śakti grahaḥ iti vācyam
bīja akṣarāṇām caturthī anta tva aniyamāt
tad apratītau api mantra prakāśita śaśiśekhara ādi upetam uddiśya haviḥ tyāgena tatra eva yājñikānām

original: vyavahāraḥ bījākṣarāṇāṃ havistyāgabhāgitvenānuddeśyatvāt śivasya pratimantraṃ bījākṣarāṇāṃ
analyzed: vyavahāraḥ bīja akṣarāṇām haviḥ tyāga bhāgi tvena anuddeśya tvāt śivasya pratimantram bīja akṣarāṇām
nānātvāt ananugamena śiva pada śakti grahasya aśakya tvāt ca

original: na ca mūrtibhedena śivaśarīrāṇāmananugatatvena tavāpi na śaktigraha iti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca mūrti bhedena śiva śarīrāṇām ananugata tvena tava api na śakti grahaḥ iti vācyam
bālya ādinā bhinna śarīreṣu caitra tva vat śiva tva jāta idṛṣṭa viśeṣa upagṛhīta tvasya vā anuga tvāt

original: adṛṣṭaśūnyasya ceśvarasya na devatātvaṃ īśānaśca tadbhinna eva tasmānmantrakaraṇakahavistyāgabhāgitvenoddeśyatvaṃ
analyzed: adṛṣṭa śūnyasya ca īśvarasya na devatā tvam īśānaḥ ca tad bhinnaḥ eva tasmāt mantra karaṇaka haviḥ tyāga bhāgi tvena uddeśya tvam
devatā tvam anyeṣām haviḥ sambandhe mantrasya a hetu tvāt iti

original: kvacicca vākyaśeṣācchaktigrahaḥ yathā yavamayaścarurbhavati vārāhī copānat vaitase
analyzed: kvacid ca vākya śeṣāt śakti grahaḥ yathā yava mayaḥ caruḥ bhavati vārāhī ca upānad vaitase

original: kaṭe prājāpatyaṃ caruṃ cinotītyatra yava-varāha-vetasaśabdāḥ kiṃ kaṅga-vāyasajambūnāṃ
analyzed: kaṭe prājāpatyam carum cinoti iti atra yava varāha vetasa śabdāḥ kim kaṅga vāyasa jambūnām
vācakāḥ uta dīrghaśrūka sūkara vañjulānām iti mleccha ārya vyavahāra darśanāt vipratipattau

original: mukhyārthānadhyavasāyāt tatpade pramāṇyāniścaye vyavahārādvyutpattiḥ sa cāviśiṣṭaḥ
analyzed: mukhya artha anadhyavasāyāt tad pade pramāṇya aniścaye vyavahārāt vyutpattiḥ sa ca aviśiṣṭaḥ

original: pikādipadeṣu mlecchavyavahārādvyutpatteḥ sūkarasyeva carmaṇā kākasyāpyupānahoḥ sambhavāditi
analyzed: pika ādi padeṣu mleccha vyavahārāt vyutpatteḥ sūkarasya iva carmaṇā kākasya api upānahoḥ sambhavāt iti

original: pūrvapakṣe vasante sarvasasyānāṃ jāyate patraśātanaṃ modanamānāḥ pradṛśyante yavāḥ kaṇiśaśalinaḥ /
analyzed: pūrvapakṣe vasante sarva sasyānām jāyate patra śātanam pradṛśyante yavāḥ kaṇi śaśalinaḥ
varāham gāvaḥ nudhāvanti

original: iti vākyāśeṣarūpavedavirodhinau mlecchaprasiddhaḥ smṛtiriva vedaviruddhā heyeti nirastāyāṃ mlecchaprasiddhau niṣpratipakṣāryavyavahārācchaktigrahaḥ
analyzed: iti vākya aśeṣa rūpa veda virodhinau mleccha prasiddhaḥ smṛtiḥ iva veda viruddhā heyā iti nirastāyām mleccha prasiddhau niṣpratipakṣa ārya vyavahārāt śakti grahaḥ

original: nanu vākyaśeṣāt śrūkarādiṣu tātparyaniścayo na śaktinirṇāyakaḥ kākādi sadṛśatayā śrūkarādau prayogasya gauṇyādināpi sambhavāditi cet na śrūkarādau  #
analyzed: nanu vākyaśeṣāt śrūkara ādiṣu tātparya niścayaḥ na śakti nirṇāyakaḥ kāka ādi sadṛśa tayā śrūkara ādau prayogasya gauṇī ādinā api sambhavāt iti ced na śrūkara ādau
tātparya vat śakteḥ api niścayāt

original: tathā hi yadyapyanādiprayogayāgitā na śaktiniyatā vaidikagauṇyādinā vyabhicārāt tathāpi śaktiranādiprayoganiyatā ato varāhaśabdasyānādi /
analyzed: tathā hi yadi api anādi prayoga yāgi tā na śakti niyatā vaidika gauṇya ādinā vyabhicārāt tathā api śaktiḥ anādi prayoga niyatā atas varāha śabdasya anādi

original: prayogayogitā śaktiśca kāke kalpyeti gauravaṃ śrūkaratve 'nādivedasambandhāt prayogo 'nādisiddha eva śaktimātraṃ kalpyata iti lāghavamityanāditātparyāt  #
analyzed: prayoga yogitā śaktiḥ ca kāke kalpyā iti gauravam śrūkaratve na ādi veda sambandhāt prayogaḥ na ādisiddhaḥ eva śakti mātram kalpyate iti lāghavam iti anādi tātparyāt
śrakare śaktiḥ eva

original: atha kākavat śrūkaro 'pyasadṛśa eva susadṛśasya gavayādeḥ sattvāt kathañcit sādṛśyaṃ
analyzed: atha kāka vat śrūkaraḥ pi asadṛśaḥ eva su sadṛśasya gavaya ādeḥ sattvāt kathañcid sādṛśyam

original: kākasyāpyastīti cet na kāka-śrūkarayorvarāhaśabdād buddhisthatve 'nayoḥ ko vācya
analyzed: kākasya api asti iti ced na kāka śrūkarayoḥ varāha śabdāt buddhi stha tve nayoḥ kaḥ vācya

original: iti jijñāsamānasya smṛtiviṣaya iti tannirāsādanyathā tātparyagrāhakavākyaśeṣasyāpi
analyzed: iti jijñāsamānasya smṛti viṣayaḥ iti tad nirāsāt anyathā tātparya grāhaka vākyaśeṣasya api

original: niṣprayojanatvaṃ syāt kathañcit sādṛśyasya sarvatra sattvena tātparyānadhyavasāyāditi /
analyzed: niṣprayojana tvam syāt kathañcid sādṛśyasya sarvatra sattvena tātparya anadhyavasāyāt iti

original: itarānvite śaktirityapi guḍajihvikā vastutonvaye 'pi na śaktiḥ /
analyzed: itara anvite śaktiḥ iti api guḍajihvikā vastutas nvaye na śaktiḥ

original: nanu vyavahāreṇānumite itarānvitajñāne padaśakyatvagrahāt tatraiva śaktiṃ gṛhṇāti upasthitatvāt /
analyzed: nanu vyavahāreṇa anumite itara anvita jñāne pada śakya tva grahāt tatra eva śaktim gṛhṇāti upasthita tvāt

original: na cāgre tatyāgo hetvabhāvāt na tu padārthajñānamātre vyavahārāt tasyānupasthiteḥ
analyzed: na ca agre tatyāgaḥ hetu abhāvāt na tu padārtha jñāna mātre vyavahārāt tasya anupasthiteḥ
upāya antarāt tad upasthiti antara kalpane māna abhāvāt atas itara anvita sva artha jñāna śakta tvena

original: jñātapadaṃ svārthānvayānubhāvakaṃ ityanvitābhidhānamiti cet na itarānvitapadārthajñānopasthitau
analyzed: jñāta padam svārtha anvaya anubhāvakam iti anvita abhidhānam iti ced na itara anvita padārtha jñāna upasthitau

original: padārthajñānaṃ viśeṣyamiti tadupasthitau tasyāpi viṣayatvāt viśiṣṭajñānasya viśeṣyaviṣayatvaniyamāditi
analyzed: padārtha jñānam viśeṣyam iti tad upasthitau tasya api viṣaya tvāt viśiṣṭa jñānasya viśeṣya viṣaya tva niyamāt iti

original: tatraiva śaktiṃ kalpayati lāghavāt na tvanvayāṃśe 'pi gauravāt /
analyzed: tatra eva śaktim kalpayati lāghavāt na tu anvaya aṃśe gauravāt

original: astu vā prathamamitarānvitajñāne śaktigrahe 'gre tatyāgaḥ anyalabhyatvapratisandhānāt
analyzed: astu vā prathamam itara anvita jñāne śakti grahe gre anya labhya tva pratisandhānāt

original: ananyalabhyasyaiva śabdārthatvāt prathamagṛhītamātrañca na balamityuktameva tasmāt
analyzed: an anya labhyasya eva śabda artha tvāt prathama gṛhīta mātram ca na balam iti uktam eva tasmāt

original: sarvaiḥ prathamagṛhītamātrañca na balamityuktameva tasmāt sarvaiḥ prathamavyavahārādupasthite
analyzed: sarvaiḥ prathama gṛhīta mātram ca na balam iti uktam eva tasmāt sarvaiḥ prathama vyavahārāt upasthite

original: kāryānvitajñāne 'nvitajñāne vā padakāraṇatvagrahāttatra śaktigraho 'gre 'pi gauravānyalabhyatvapratisandhāne 'pi na tatyāgaḥ
analyzed: kārya anvita jñāne nvita jñāne vā pada kāraṇatva grahāt tatra śakti grahaḥ gre pi gaurava anya labhya tva pratisandhāne pi na tad tyāgaḥ
pūrva kalpanāyāḥ viparīta tvāt iti sva śiṣya vyāmohanam

original: atha kāryatvasyetarapadalabhyatvena tathā na tvevamanvaye tasyetarapadāśakyatvācchakyatve
analyzed: atha kāryatvasya itara pada labhya tvena tathā na tu evam anvaye tasya itara pada aśakya tvāt śakya tve

original: vā avivādāditi cet na ghaṭaśaktatvena jñātaṃ padaṃ svārthasmaraṇadvārā ākāṅkṣādisahakārivaśāt
analyzed: vā avivādāt iti ced na ghaṭa śakta tvena jñātam padam sva artha smaraṇa dvārā ākāṅkṣā ādi sahakāri vaśāt

original: samabhivyāhṛtapadārthena saha svārthasyānvayamanubhāvayati svabhāvādityanyathaivānvayajñānalābhāt kiṃ śaktyā /
analyzed: samabhivyāhṛta padārthena saha sva arthasya anvayam anubhāvayati svabhāvāt iti anyathā eva anvaya jñāna lābhāt kim śaktyā
anvaya mātra śaktau api anvaya viśeṣa jñāna artham ākāṅkṣā ādeḥ avaśyam apekṣaṇāt kriyā kāraka padayoḥ pratyekam itara anvita svārtha bodhaka tve vākya artha dvaya dhī prasaṅgāt
na ca ekam eva anvita abhidhāyakam itarat tu pratiyogi smārakam iti vācyam
aviśeṣāt aśakya anvaya anubhave tiprasaṅgāt

original: anvaye 'pi śaktiriti cet na aśakyamapi hi śakyānvayaṃ bodhayati nānyat śakyānvayatvasya svarūpatoniyāmakatvāt anyathā tavāpyapratīkārāt /
analyzed: anvaye pi śaktiḥ iti ced na aśakyam api hi śakya anvayam bodhayati na anyat śakya anvaya tvasya svarūpataḥ niyāmaka tvāt anyathā tava api apratīkārāt

original: nanvevaṃ padānāmanvitajñānajanakatvāt tatra śaktirastyeva aśaktasyājanakatvāt tavāpi
analyzed: nanu evam padānām anvita jñāna janaka tvāt tatra śaktiḥ asti eva aśaktasya ajanaka tvāt tava api

original: padādanvayabodha itīśvarecchāsattvāditi satyaṃ kintu anvayabodhe svarūpasatī sā vyāptiyate
analyzed: padāt anvaya bodhaḥ iti īśvara icchā sattvāt iti satyam kintu anvaya bodhe svarūpa satī sā vyāptiyate

original: na tu jñātā ghaṭajñānaśaktatvena jñānādeva ghaṭānvayabodhopapatteḥ yathā tava jātiśaktapadasya
analyzed: na tu jñātā ghaṭa jñāna śakta tvena jñānāt eva ghaṭa anvaya bodha upapatteḥ yathā tava jāti śakta padasya

original: ātmavyaktijñāne dṛṣṭañca jñātakaraṇe sāmānyasambandhitayā jñātasyāpi viśeṣabuddhyupāyatvaṃ
analyzed: ātma vyakti jñāne dṛṣṭam ca jñāta karaṇe sāmānya sambandhi tayā jñātasya api viśeṣa buddhi upāya tvam
yathā vahni sāmānya vyāpta tayā gṛhīta dhūmasya vahni viśeṣa buddhi janaka tvam
atha ghaṭa jñāna tvam itara anvita ghaṭa jñāne pi asti iti tena rūpeṇa anvita ghaṭa jñāne pi

original: jñātā śaktirvyāpriyata iti cet satyaṃ kintu ghaṭajñānatvaṃ śakyatāvacchekaṃ na tvanvitaghaṭajñānatvaṃ
analyzed: jñātā śaktiḥ vyāpriyate iti ced satyam kintu ghaṭa jñāna tvam śakya tā vacchekam na tu anvita ghaṭa jñāna tvam
gauravāt anya labhya tvāt ca

original: evañca jātivācakapadasya vyaktāviva ekaiva śaktiranvayāṃśe svarūpasatī padārthāṃśe jñātā vyāptiyate /
analyzed: evañca jāti vācaka padasya vyaktau iva ekā eva śaktiḥ anvaya aṃśe sva rūpa satī padārtha aṃśe jñātā vyāptiḥ yate
jāti vyaktā iyaḥ samāna saṃvid saṃvedya tvāt tathā ghaṭa jñāna ādikantu na anvaya viṣaya tā niyatam

original: smaraṇe vyabhicārāditi cet ghaṭānubhavaviśeṣaṃ prati ghaṭapadatvena kāraṇatā sa ca
analyzed: smaraṇe vyabhicārāt iti ced ghaṭa anubhava viśeṣam prati ghaṭa pada tvena kāraṇatā sa ca

original: śabdānubhavo 'nvayaviṣayatāniyata eva kelalasya śabdenānanubhavāt smaraṇañca prati
analyzed: śabda anubhavaḥ nvaya viṣaya tā niyataḥ eva kelalasya śabdena ananubhavāt smaraṇam ca prati

original: padatvena na janakatā vyabhicārāt kintu sambandhitayā jñātatvena /
analyzed: pada tvena na janaka tā vyabhicārāt kintu sambandhi tayā jñāta tvena

original: syādetat anvayatātparyakatayā tatpratipādakaṃ padamityavivādaṃ tātparyanirvāhikā ca vṛttiḥ sā ceha na gauṇī na vā lakṣaṇeti śaktisiddhiḥ /
analyzed: syāt etat anvaya tātparyaka tayā tad pratipādakam padam iti avivādam tātparya nirvāhikā ca vṛttiḥ sā ca iha na gauṇī na vā lakṣaṇā iti śakti siddhiḥ

original: athānvaye lakṣaṇaiva svārthasambandhini tātparyāt padārthopasthityanantaraṃ tadanvayopapatteśca /
analyzed: atha anvaye lakṣaṇā eva svārtha sambandhini tātparyāt padārtha upasthiti anantaram tad anvaya upapatteḥ ca

original: na ca vṛttidvayasya virodhaḥ anvayaviśeṣaṇatayā padārthopasthiteḥ /
analyzed: na ca vṛtti dvayasya virodhaḥ anvaya viśeṣaṇa tayā padārtha upasthiteḥ
na ca lākṣaṇikānām ananubhāvaka tvāt anvaya anubhavaḥ katham iti vācyam

original: padārthasya smaraṇādanvaye śaktatvācca padānāṃ śaktyānanubhāvakatayā sarvatra lākṣaṇikasyaivānubhāvakatvaditi /
analyzed: padārthasya smaraṇāt anvaye śakta tvāt ca padānām śaktyā ananubhāvaka tayā sarvatra lākṣaṇikasya eva anubhāvaka tvat iti
tat na
vṛttiḥ hi jña tā upayujyate na svarūpa sati atiprasaṅgāt
na ca iha svārtha sambandhi tayā anvayaḥ prāk avagataḥ vākya arthasya apūrva tvāt

original: kiñca śakyasambandhitayā anvaye lakṣaṇārtha padārthe śaktikalpanaṃ tadvaraṃ lāghavādanvaye
analyzed: kiñca śakya sambandhi tayā anvaye padārthe śakti kalpanam tat varam lāghavāt anvaye

original: 'pi śaktirastu kiṃ vṛttidvayakalpanā evaṃ sthite prayoge 'pi anvayaḥ padaśakyaḥ vṛttyatyantaraṃ
analyzed: śaktiḥ astu kim vṛtti dvaya kalpanā evam sthite prayoge anvayaḥ pada śakyaḥ vṛtti atyantaram
vinā pada pratipādya tvāt padārtha vat iti
ucyate

original: vṛttiṃ vināpi tātparyanirvāhāt kiṃ vṛttyā padānāmuktakrameṇānvayabodhajanakatvasambhavādanyathā śaktyā tātparyanirvāhodṛṣṭa iti lakṣaṇocchedaḥ
analyzed: vṛttim vinā api tātparya nirvāhāt kim vṛttyā padānām ukta krameṇa anvaya bodha janaka tva sambhavāt anyathā śaktyā tātparya nirvāhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti lakṣaṇa ucchedaḥ

original: atha śaktiṃ vināpiśakyasambandhāt tannirvāha iti na tatra śaktiḥ tarhi vṛttiṃ vināpi tannirvāha iti kiṃ vṛttyā /
analyzed: atha śaktim vinā api śakya sambandhāt tad nirvāhaḥ iti na tatra śaktiḥ tarhi vṛttim vinā api tad nirvāhaḥ iti kim vṛttyā

original: ata evānumānamaprayojakaṃ anyathā padapratipādyatvādeva śaktisādhane vṛttyantarocchedaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva anumānam aprayojakam anyathā pada pratipādya tvāt eva śakti sādhane vṛtti antara ucchedaḥ

original: ata eva dhūmo 'stītyatra dhūmapadasya vahnibodhaparatve 'pi vahnau na lakṣaṇā śaktyā dhūmopasthitau anumānadvārā tatpratītisambhavāt /
analyzed: atas eva dhūmaḥ sti iti atra dhūma padasya vahni bodha para tve vahnau na lakṣaṇā śaktyā dhūma upasthitau anumāna dvārā tad pratīti sambhavāt

original: tathā gaccha gacchati cet kānta panthānaḥ santu te śivāḥ /
analyzed: tathā gaccha gacchati ced kānta panthānaḥ santu te śivāḥ

original: mamāpi janma tatraiva bhūyādyatra gato bhavān iti /
analyzed: mama api janma tatra eva bhūyāt yatra gataḥ bhavān iti

original: vākyasya mā gacchetyatra tātparye 'pi na lakṣaṇā gamanasya priyāmaraṇahetutvaṃ hi
analyzed: vākyasya mā gaccha iti atra tātparye na lakṣaṇā gamanasya priyā maraṇa hetu tvam hi

original: vākyārthaḥ tena gamanaṃ mayā na kartavyaṃ priyāmaraṇahetutvādityanumānādeva gamane
analyzed: vākya arthaḥ tena gamanam mayā na kartavyam priyā maraṇa hetu tvāt iti anumānāt eva gamane
bibl ind

original: yatra hi mukhyayā sākṣāt paramparayā vā na tātparyanirvāhaḥ tatra lakṣaṇā /
analyzed: yatra hi mukhyayā sākṣāt paramparayā vā na tātparya nirvāhaḥ tatra lakṣaṇā
nanu ghaṭam ānaya iti atra pratyekam anvaya viśeṣe jijñāsā bhavati

original: na ca sāmānyānavagame viśeṣe sa syāt ityanvayasāmānye śaktireveti cet na kāraṇena kiyāyā ca kriyākārakasāmānyākṣepāttadupapatteḥ dṛṣṭe phalādau  #
analyzed: na ca sāmānya anavagame viśeṣe sa syāt iti anvaya sāmānye śaktiḥ eva iti ced na kāraṇena kiyāyā ca kriyā kāraka sāmānya ākṣepāt tad upapatteḥ dṛṣṭe phala ādau
rasa viśeṣa jijñāsā vat

original: etena yaduktamanvitapadārthe mama tvakaika śaktistava tvekā padārthe 'parā tvanvaya iti nirastam /
analyzed: etena yat uktam anvita padārthe mama tu aka eka śaktiḥ tava tu ekā padārthe parā tu anvaye iti nirastam
anvaye śakti abhāvāt

original: na caivamanyayānubhave padaviniyogo na syāditi vācyam /
analyzed: na ca evam anyayā anubhave pada viniyogaḥ na syāt iti vācyam
anvaya anubhava artham eva padārthe padānām śakti kalpanāt

original: tasmāt padaṃ karaṇaṃ padārthasmaraṇaṃ vyāpāraḥ ākāṅkṣādisahakārivaśāt smāritārthānvayānubhavaḥ phalaṃ padārthasmaraṇaṃ na vyadhāyakaṃ vyāparatvāt
analyzed: tasmāt padam karaṇam padārtha smaraṇam vyāpāraḥ ākāṅkṣā ādi sahakāri vaśāt smārita artha anvaya anubhavaḥ phalam padārtha smaraṇam na vyadhāyakam
na ca smaraṇa dvārā padārthaḥ eva
kāraṇam tasya anāgata tva ādinā sva smaraṇe anvaya anabhave ca ānaka tvāt

original: tathapi padārthasmaraṇameva karaṇamastu āvaśayakatvāt ata eva cintāvaśopanītapadārthānāmanvayabodhanāt
analyzed: padārtha smaraṇam eva karaṇam astu āvaśayaka tvāt atas eva cintā vaśa upanīta padārthānām anvaya bodhanāt

original: kāvyādiriti cet na smaraṇasya nirvyāratvenākaraṇatvāt ananyathāsiddhānvaya-vyatirekābhyāṃ
analyzed: kāvya ādiḥ iti ced na smaraṇasya nirvyāra tvena akaraṇa tvāt ananyathā asiddha anvaya vyatirekābhyām
ākāṅkṣā ādimat padasya anvaya anubhava viśeṣe kāraṇa tvāt padārtha upasthiteḥ saṃsarga dhī mātra hetu tve

original: 'pi śābdasaṃsargadhīviṣaye padasyaiva hetutvāt gauḥ karmatvamānayanamityatra padārthajñāne
analyzed: pi śābda saṃsarga dhī viṣaye padasya eva hetu tvāt gauḥ karma tvam ānayanam iti atra padārtha jñāne
anvaya jñāna anudayāt pada viśeṣa upasthita padārtha jñānasya hetu tve pada viśeṣasya eva āvaśyaka tvena hetu tvāt ca

original: kāvyasthale ca padārthajñānavyāpārakaṃ utprakṣādisahakṛtaṃ mana evānvayānubhavakaraṇam /
analyzed: kāvya sthale ca padārtha jñāna vyāpārakam utprakṣā ādi sahakṛtam manaḥ eva anvaya anubhava karaṇam

original: na caiva utprekṣayāḥ prathak pramāṇatvaṃ vyabhicārijātīyatayā liṅgādāviva pramākaraṇatāvacchedakānatiprasaktānugatarūpābhāvānnirvyāpāratvācca  #
analyzed: na ca eva utprekṣayāḥ prathak pramāṇa tvam vyabhicāri jātīya tayā liṅga ādau iva pramā karaṇa tā avacchedaka anatiprasakta anugata rūpa abhāvāt nirvyāpāra tvāt ca
kintu pramāṇa sahakāriṇī sā

original: ata eva mānase liṅgaparāmarśe vyāptismṛtyādi na pṛthak pramāṇam /
analyzed: atas eva mānase liṅga parāmarśe vyāpti smṛti ādi na pṛthak pramāṇam

original: atha padamantareṇāpi yogyatādijñāne 'nvayabodho bhavatyataḥ padārthasmaraṇa eva padānāmupakṣayaḥ /
analyzed: atha padam antareṇa api yogyatā ādi jñāne nvaya bodhaḥ bhavati atas padārtha smaraṇe eva padānām upakṣayaḥ

original: taduktaṃ paśyataḥ śvetamā rūpaṃ heṣābdañca śṛṇvataḥ /
analyzed: tat uktam paśyataḥ rūpam śṛṇvataḥ
khura vikṣepa śabdaḥ ca śvetaḥ śvedhāvatī iti dhīḥ

original: iti cet satyaṃ prayojakavākyoccāraṇānantaraṃ prayojyavyāpāradarśanāt anvitajñānopapattyarthaṃ padasyaiva śaktiḥ kalpyate prathamastasyaiva
analyzed: iti ced satyam prayojaka vākya uccāraṇa anantaram prayojya vyāpāra darśanāt anvita jñāna upapatti artham padasya eva śaktiḥ kalpyate prathamaḥ tasya eva
padārtheṣu śakti antara kalpane gauravāt tat āhuḥ prāthabhya ādi bhidhātṛ tvāt tātparya upagamāt api
padānām eva sā śaktiḥ varam abhyupagamya tā

original: iti śveto 'śvedhāvatīti dhīśca liṅgajā padasya kḷptakāraṇabhāvasyābhāvāditi /
analyzed: iti śvetā śvedhāvatī iti dhīḥ ca liṅga jā padasya kḷpta kāraṇa bhāvasya abhāvāt iti
bibl ind
jāti śakti vādaḥ
evam padārtha mātre śaktau padārthaḥ nirūpyate
tatra prabhākarāḥ
yadi api ānayana ādi vyavahārāt vyaktau eva śaktiḥ ucitā

original: tathāpyānantya-vyabhicārābhyāṃ tatra na śaktigrahaḥ samuccayena śakyatve gāṃ dadyādityādau sarvopādānāsāmarthyaṃ ekasya śakyatve 'nadhyavasāyaḥ
analyzed: tathā api ānantya vyabhicārābhyām tatra na śakti grahaḥ samuccayena śakya tve gām dadyāt ityādau sarva upādāna asāmarthyam ekasya śakya tve na adhyavasāyaḥ

original: na ca govyaktimātramarthaḥ mātraśabdasya sarvārthatve uktadoṣāt sāmānyārthakatve
analyzed: na ca go vyakti mātram arthaḥ mātra śabdasya sarva artha tve ukta doṣāt sāmānya arthaka tve

original: vyakterapratīteḥ nānārthatve ca sarvāsāṃ pratyekaṃ jñātumaśakyaṃ śaktau śakye ca
analyzed: vyakteḥ apratīteḥ nānā artha tve ca sarvāsām pratyekam jñātum aśakyam śaktau śakye ca
gauravam apūrva gavi vyavahāra abhāvāt ca

original: nāpi gotvenopalakṣitā vyaktiḥ śakyā dhenupadavadato na śakyānantaraṃ na vyabhicāraḥ na sarvāsaṅgrahaḥ na nānārthatvaṃ gotvena tāsāmaikyāditi  #
analyzed: nā api go tvena upalakṣitā vyaktiḥ śakyā dhenu pada vat atas na śakya anantaram na vyabhicāraḥ na sarva asaṅgrahaḥ na nānārtha tvam go tvena tāsām aikyāt iti
vācyam

original: rūpāntareṇa vijñātamanyena rūpeṇa hi upalakṣyate yathā kākena gṛhaviśeṣogotvena dhāna karmavyaktiviśeṣaḥ svatovilakṣaṇaḥ na tu kākādyākāreṇaiva  #
analyzed: rūpa antareṇa vijñātam anyena rūpeṇa hi upalakṣyate yathā kākena gṛha viśeṣaḥ go tvena karma vyakti viśeṣaḥ svatas vilakṣaṇaḥ na tu kāka ādi ākāreṇa eva
tad pratītiḥ

original: na ca vyaktīnāṃ jātiṃ vinā rūpāntaramekamasti jñāyate vā gopadād gaurityeva pratīteḥ
analyzed: na ca vyaktīnām jātim vinā rūpa antaram ekam asti jñāyate vā go padāt gauḥ iti eva pratīteḥ

original: gotvaviśiṣṭe ca kāryānvayādgotvaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ nopalakṣaṇaṃ tadanyena kāryānvaye upalakṣaṇarṃ
analyzed: go tva viśiṣṭe ca kārya anvayāt go tvam viśeṣaṇam na upalakṣaṇam tad anyena kārya anvaye
yathā ayam vāsasvī devadatta śabda vācyaḥ iti atra vāsaḥ

original: na ca gotvaikatvena vyaktīnāmaikyaṃ kriyate aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: na ca go tva eka tvena vyaktīnām aikyam kriyate aśakya tvāt
na api jñāpyate asattvāt
na ca tad eka tvam eva vyakteḥ eka tvam asambhavāt

original: nāpi vyaktiḥ śakyā gotvamavacchedakaṃ kāraṇatve daṇḍavat evaṃ hi gopadāt na gotvaviśiṣṭabuddhiḥ
analyzed: nā api vyaktiḥ śakyā go tvam avacchedakam kāraṇa tve daṇḍa vat evam hi go padāt na go tva viśiṣṭa buddhiḥ
syāt śakti graha āhita saṃskāra sacivāt go padāt eva dhenu padau iva go tva viśiṣṭa jñānam tad udbodhaḥ ca

original: tadvadeva paramparāsambandhāditi cet na tatra hi dhānakarmavyaktiviśeṣasyāvaśyaśakyatve
analyzed: tadvat eva paramparā sambandhāt iti ced na tatra hi dhāna karma vyakti viśeṣasya avaśya śakya tve

original: 'nugamāya gotvamavacchedakamātraṃ na tu vaiṣarītya gotvasya vṛṣabhe 'pi sattvāt iha
analyzed: anugamāya go tvam avacchedaka mātram na tu go tvasya sattvāt iha

original: tu vyaktiratiprasakteti jātiviśiṣṭaiva sā śakyā syāt /
analyzed: tu vyaktiḥ ati prasaktā iti jāti viśiṣṭā eva sā śakyā syāt
bibl ind

original: vastutastu jāteḥ śakyopalakṣaṇatve śakyavacchedakatve vāvaśyakatvāt lāghavācca jātireva śakyā syāt na tu vyaktiḥ dhenupade tu gotvaṃ na tathā  #
analyzed: vastutas tu jāteḥ śakya upalakṣaṇa tve śakya avacchedaka tve vā āvaśyaka tvāt lāghavāt ca jātiḥ eva śakyā syāt na tu vyaktiḥ dhenu pade tu go tvam na tathā
atiprasaṅgāt

original: astu tarhi jātiviśiṣṭaṃ śakyaṃ svavyavahāreṇa ca svahetutayā jātiviśiṣṭajñānasyānumitatvāditi cet na viśeṣyabhedādviśiṣṭānāmantatvena vyaktivācyatve  #
analyzed: astu tarhi jāti viśiṣṭam śakyam sva vyavahāreṇa ca sva hetutayā jāti viśiṣṭa jñānasya anumita tvāt iti ced na viśeṣya bhedāt viśiṣṭānām anta tvena vyakti vācya tve
ukta doṣa grāsāt
viśeṣaṇasya aikya aikyena viśiṣṭa nāma aikyasya upalakṣa pakṣa vat duṣya tvāt tasmāt vyakteḥ apadārtha tve jātiḥ eva padārthaḥ

original: vastutastu vyaktau jātiranugamikā viśeṣikā cāvaśyaṃ vācyeti nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇānyāyena saiva vācyā /
analyzed: vastutas tu vyaktau jātiḥ anugamikā viśeṣikā ca avaśyam vācyā iti na agṛhīta viśeṣaṇā nyāyena sā eva vācyā

original: atha jātāvapi vyaktireva viśeṣaḥ dharmāntarābhāvāt gavetarāvṛttitve sati sakalagovṛttitvāderūpādherapi
analyzed: atha jātau api vyaktiḥ eva viśeṣaḥ dharma antara abhāvāt gavā itara avṛtti tve sati sakala go vṛtti tva ādeḥ ūpādheḥ api
vyakti ghaṭita tvāt vācyam iti na jāteḥ
svatas eva vyāvṛtta tvāt
anyathā jāti vyaktoḥ vyāvṛtta tva jñānāt anyonya vyāvṛtta tva buddhau anyonya āśrayaḥ

original: svatovyāvṛttatvañca na svayameva svavyāvartakatvaṃ svasmin svāvṛtteḥ /
analyzed: svatas vyāvṛtta tvam ca na svayam eva sva vyāvartaka tvam svasmin sva āvṛtteḥ
nā api vyāvartakam vinā eva vyāvṛtta tvam asambhavāt
kintu sva āśrayavat sva ātmani vyāvṛtta dhī janaka svabhāva tvam pareṣām antya viśeṣa vat

original: vyāvartakadharme 'pi dharmāntarādeva vyāvṛttabuddhāvanavasthā syādata eva kiñciddhi vastu svata eva vilakṣaṇamityāhuḥ /
analyzed: vyāvartaka dharme pi dharma antarāt eva vyāvṛtta buddhau anavasthā syāt atas eva kiñcid hi vastu svatas eva vilakṣaṇam iti āhuḥ

original: astu vā vyaktyā vyāvṛttatayā bodhitā jātireva padārtholāghavāt na tu vaiparītyamubhayaṃ
analyzed: astu vā vyaktyā vyāvṛtta tayā bodhitā jātiḥ eva padārthaḥ lāghavāt na tu vaiparītyam ubhayam

original: vā gauravāt kutastarhi vyaktidhīḥ jātiśaktādeva kathamanyaśaktādanyadhīḥ svabhāvāt
analyzed: vā gauravāt kutas tarhi vyakti dhīḥ jāti śaktāt eva katham anya śaktāt anya dhīḥ svabhāvāt

original: tatsvabhāvatvameva vyaktiśaktiṃ vinā na nirvahatīti cet na gopadaṃ hi niyamatojātivyaktī
analyzed: tad svabhāva tvam eva vyakti śaktim vinā na nirvahati iti ced na go padam hi niyamataḥ jāti vyaktī

original: bodhayati tatrāsya jātiśaktidhīreva sahakāriṇī kalpyate lāghavādāvaśyakatvācca na
analyzed: bodhayati tatra asya jāti śakti dhīḥ eva sahakāriṇī kalpyate lāghavāt āvaśyaka tvāt ca na
tu vyakti śakti dhīḥ api gauravāt

original: jātiśaktijñāne sati tāṃ vinā vyaktibodhe vilambābhāvāt yathā tava padārthaśaktādevānvayadhīḥ /
analyzed: jāti śakti jñāne sati tām vinā vyakti bodhe vilamba abhāvāt yathā tava padārtha śaktāt eva anvaya dhīḥ

original: yadvā jātiśaktameva padaṃ vyaktiṃ bodhayati aśakyatve 'pi jātyāśrayatvameva niyāmakaṃ yathā aśakyamapi svārthāntaraṃ bodhayati /
analyzed: yat vā jāti śaktam eva padam vyaktim bodhayati aśakya tve pi jāti āśraya tvam eva niyāmakam yathā aśakyam api svārtha antaram bodhayati

original: tatra prayojakatvena kḷptā śaktirevāstu jātyāśrayatvasya tathātvakalpane gauravāditi cet na anyalabhyasyāpadārthatvādanyathā anvayo 'pi śakyaḥ  #
analyzed: tatra prayojaka tvena kṷptā śaktiḥ evā astu jāti āśraya tvasya tathātva kalpane gauravāt iti ced na anya labhyasya apadārtha tvāt anyathā anvayaḥ pi śakyaḥ
syāt lakṣaṇa ādi ucchedaḥ ca
atha vā jāti śakti jñānāt jāti dhīḥ bhavantī vyaktim api gocarayati

original: vyaktiṃ vinā jāterabhāvāt yo yena vinā na bhāsate taddhīhetustamavabodhayati yathā
analyzed: vyaktim vinā jāteḥ abhāvāt yaḥ yena vinā na bhāsate tad dhī hetuḥ tam avabodhayati yathā

original: jñānadhīhetustadviṣayaṃ yathā vā tavādhikaraṇasiddhānto jñānādinityatvaṃ anyathā
analyzed: jñāna dhī hetuḥ tad viṣayam yathā vā tava adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ jñāna ādi nitya tvam anyathā

original: padaṃ jātimapi na bodhayet kevalāyā apratīteḥ tathā ca jātiśaktikalpanāvaityarthaṃ
analyzed: padam jātim api na bodhayet kevalāyāḥ apratīteḥ tathā ca

original: tasmāt jātijñānārthaṃ kḷptā śaktirvyaktimapi bodhayati ekavittivedyatvaniyamāt /
analyzed: tasmāt jāti jñāna artham kḷptā śaktiḥ vyaktim api bodhayati eka vitti vedya tva niyamāt

original: etenaikavittivedyataiva vyaktiśaktiṃ vinā na syāt jñāpakābhāvāt /
analyzed: etena eka vitti vedya tā eva vyakti śaktim vinā na syāt jñāpaka abhāvāt

original: na hi vyaktijñānamahetukaṃ jātihetukaṃ vā sadātanatvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: na hi vyakti jñānam ahetukam jāti hetukam vā sadātana tva prasaṅgāt
nā api jāti dhī hetukam saṃvid bheda āpatteḥ iti nirastam
jāti śakteḥ eva vyakti jñāpaka tvāt
bibl ind

original: nanu jātiṃ vinā pratyakṣādinā vyaktijñānādanyaiva vyaktidhīsāmagrī jātiviśiṣṭajñānañcobhayajñāpakasāmagrīdvayasamājādārthaṃ /
analyzed: nanu jātim vinā pratyakṣa ādinā vyakti jñānāt anyā eva vyakti dhī sāmagrī jāti viśiṣṭa jñānam ca ubhaya jñāpaka sāmagrī dvaya samājāda artham

original: ata eva vyaktiṃ vinā jātesmaraṇena jātismaraṇasya vyaktiviṣayatvaniyamāt jātijñāpakamātrameva vyaktijñāpakaṃ kalpyate sāmānyakalpanāyāṃ bādhakābhāvāditi  #
analyzed: atas eva vyaktim vinā jāteḥ smaraṇena jāti smaraṇasya vyakti viṣaya tva niyamāt jāti jñāpaka mātram eva vyakti jñāpakam kalpyate sāmānya kalpanāyām bādhaka abhāvāt iti
parāstam
jātim vinā api vyakti smaraṇāt tatra anyā eva sāmagrī ca ati viśiṣṭa smaraṇam ca ubhaya aṃśa smāraka samājāt iti
atra brūmaḥ
jāti vyakti pratyakṣa ādi bodhe tathā eva sāmagrī dvayasya pṛthak anvaya vyatireka grahāt śābde

original: tu vyaktibodhe jātiśaktijñānameva heturlāghavāt na sāmagṣantaraṃ tatsattve tena vinā vilambābhāvāt /
analyzed: tu vyakti bodhe jāti śakti jñānam eva hetuḥ lāghavāt na sāmagṣa antaram tad sattve tena vinā vilamba abhāvāt

original: evañca jātiśaktatvena jñātaṃ padaṃ jātiviśiṣṭasya smārakamanubhāvakañca /
analyzed: evam ca jāti śakta tvena jñātam padam jāti viśiṣṭasya smārakam anubhāvakañca

original: nanu jñāne śaktiḥ śakyatvāt tathāca yasya jñāne śaktistacchakyaṃ jāti-vyaktijñāne
analyzed: nanu jñāne śaktiḥ śakya tvāt tathā ca yasya jñāne śaktiḥ tat śakyam jāti vyakti jñāne

original: ca śaktiriti jātivadvyaktirapi śakyeti cet na yadviṣayatayā hi jñātā jñāne śaktirupayujyate
analyzed: ca śaktiḥ iti jāti vat vyaktiḥ api śakyā iti ced na yad viṣaya tayā hi jñātā jñāne śaktiḥ upayujyate

original: tat śaktijñāne viṣayatayā śakyatāvacchedakaṃ śakyaṃ jātijñānañca tatheti jātireva
analyzed: tat śakti jñāne viṣayatayā śakya tā avacchedakam śakyam jāti jñānam ca tathā iti jātiḥ eva
śakyāḥ na tu vyakti jñāna tvam api acchedakam gauravāt

original: na ca śakyajñāne niyataviṣayatvameva śakyatvaṃ vyavahārānumita śakyānubhavaviṣayāṇāmanvaye
analyzed: na ca śakya jñāne niyata viṣaya tvam eva śakya tvam vyavahāra anumita śakya anubhava viṣayāṇām anvaye
tad sambandhi miti mātṛṇām api śakya tā āpatteḥ evañca jāti vyakti jñāna janakaka tvāt ubhayatra api śabda śaktiḥ

original: jātyaṃśe sa jñātā vyaktyaṃśe svarūpasato heturlāghavāditi kubjaśaktivādaḥ /
analyzed: jāti aṃśe sa jñātā vyakti aṃśe svarūpa sataḥ hetuḥ lāghavāt iti kubja śakti vādaḥ

original: evañca saiva tadaiva tenaiva jñātā ajñātā ca vācikā avācikāvetyatra jātivyakyavacchedakabhedenāvirodhaḥ tvayāpyanvaye kubjaśaktisvīkārāt /
analyzed: evam ca sā eva tadā eva tena eva jñātā ajñātā ca vācikā avācikā ava iti atra jāti vyakya avacchedaka bhedena avirodhaḥ tvayā api anvaye kubja śakti svīkārāt
vyakteḥ śakya tve pi jñāta śakti śabda janita jñāna viṣaya tva lakṣaṇam vācyatvam na asti

original: na caivaṃ paribhāṣā śabdajanyajñānaviṣayatvena vācyatve lākṣaṇikāderapi vācyatvāpatteḥ
analyzed: na ca evam paribhāṣā śabda janya jñāna viṣaya tvena vācya tve lākṣaṇika ādeḥ api vācya tva āpatteḥ

original: vyakteḥ śakyatve 'pi vyaktiśaktijñānaṃ na kāraṇaṃ vyaktiśaktijñānatvaṃ nāvacchedakamiti lāghavam /
analyzed: vyakteḥ śakya tve pi vyakti śakti jñānam na kāraṇam vyakti śakti jñāna tvam na avacchedakam iti lāghavam

original: yattu tacchaktatvena jñātādeva tadarthabodhaḥ śaktibhramādapi dhīdarśanāt /

analyzed: na kriyā nitya tvāt kārakam na kartṛ ādi kriyāyāḥ tatra asamavāyāt para samaveta kriyā phala bhāgi tva abhāvāt

original: kartṛtvavyāpārānāśrayatvāt acetanatvāt tayā saha vibhāgābhāvāt kriyānādhāratvācceti
analyzed: kartṛ tva vyāpāra anāśraya tvāt acetana tvāt tayā saha vibhāga abhāvāt kriyā anādhāra tvāt ca iti

analyzed: ced na vyakti vyavahārāt eva ukta nyāyena jātau śakti grahāt jāti savikalpaka ādi avyāvṛtta tayā

analyzed: jñātāyām vyaktau kriyā anvayaḥ sa vikalpakam ca ālocana dvārā jāti janyam iti paramparayā

original: yadvā na kevalavyakteḥ kārakatvaṃ na hi gaurgacchatītyatra vyaktimātraṃ yātīti kasyacitpratītiḥ kintu jātiviśiṣṭāyāḥ tathācobhayamapi kārakam
analyzed: yat vā na kevala vyakteḥ kāraka tvam na hi gauḥ gacchati iti atra vyakti mātram yāti iti kasyacid pratītiḥ kintu jāti viśiṣṭāyāḥ tathā ca ubhayam api kārakam

original: śrīkarastu kevalajāti-vyakteyarakāratvāt kriyānvayovyakterāśrayatayā jāteravacchedakatayā āruṇyādivat evañca jātiśaktapadāt jāteranubhavaḥ  #
analyzed: śrīkaraḥ tu kevala jāti vyakteḥ yarakāra tvāt kriyā anvayaḥ vyakteḥ āśraya tayā jāteḥ avacchedaka tayā āruṇya ādi vat evam ca jāti śakta padāt jāteḥ anubhavaḥ

original: na ca vṛttiṃ vinā anvayānubhave 'praveśānna vyakteḥ śābdatvaṃ vṛttiṃ vināpi ekavittivedyatvaniyamena
analyzed: na ca vṛttim vinā anvaya anubhave praveśāt na vyakteḥ śābda tvam vṛttim vinā api eka vitti vedya tva niyamena

original: ata eva jātiśaktireva vyaktiṃ bodhayatīti guravaḥ /

original: na caivamaśakyaparatve lakṣaṇā yathā hyanyata eva jñānānna śaktistathā lakṣaṇāpi
analyzed: na ca evam aśakya paratve lakṣaṇā yathā hi anyatas eva jñānāt na śaktiḥ tathā lakṣaṇā api

original: na tat kimaśakye 'pi mukhyaḥ prayogaḥḥ satyaṃ śaktyā sākṣādupasthita eva tasya mukhyatvātsvaśaktyeti tvadhikam /
analyzed: na tat mukhyaḥ prayogaḥ satyam śaktyā sākṣāt upasthitaḥ eva tasya mukhya tvāt sva śaktyā iti tu adhikam

original: yadi ca tato na taddhīstadā tatra śaktireva syāt anyathā taddhīrna syādeva /
analyzed: yadi ca tatas na tad dhīḥ tadā tatra śaktiḥ eva syāt anyathā tad dhīḥ na syāt eva

original: nanu pada-jātibhyāmapyekojāti-vyaktyanubhavaḥ kriyate tatra jātyaṃśe padasya vyaktyaṃśe
analyzed: nanu pada jātibhyām api ekaḥ jāti vyakti anubhavaḥ kriyate tatra jāti aṃśe padasya vyakti aṃśe

original: jāteranubhāvakatvamayameva upādānārthaṃ iti cet tarhi jāteḥ kāraṇatvāpekṣayā śaktijñāne

original: viṣayatayā jāteravacchedakatvaṃ vyaktimādāyaiva pratīyate na kevalāyāḥ vyaktiṃ vinā

jāteḥ apratīteḥ tathāca jāteḥ avacchedaka tve na agṛhīta viśeṣaṇa anyāyena vyakteḥ avacchedaka tvam

original: vajralepāyitamiti śaktijñāne viṣayatayā avacchedakatvāt jātivatsāpi śakyā tasmāt
